name: Jackpot Words
description: Create the right word combos and win huge payouts. The more coins you win, the higher you rise!

name: Last Pocket
description:
"Welcome to the thrilling world of "Last Pocket," where your strategic prowess and quick thinking will be put to the ultimate test! Arrange the wooden planks with a tap, creating a maze of reflections and angles to guide the ball towards victory. Ten distinct elements add a twist to every level, keeping you on your toes and your mind engaged.
Are you ready to take on this pocket puzzler and immerse yourself in the world of "Last Pocket"?

name: Revolution 3
description: The reboot to the classic game has arrived! Revolution³ is a tribute to the classic mobile games of the past, no microtransactions or loot boxes. Just simple, honest-to-goodness fun.

name: Car Park: Draw Lines Puzzle
description: Your goal is to park your car in a safe location without hitting other cars or obstacles. You can guide your vehicles to the parking spot by drawing a line with your finger. However, some parking spaces are crowded and difficult to navigate, so plan your moves carefully.

name: Revolution: The New Cycle
description: Tap your way up through each spinning ring avoiding red to gain a point. Oh, and don't wait too long or the walls will crush you! You will need fast reactions and nerves of steel! How far can you go?

name: Monculi
description: 9 little men slapping on eachother.

name: Lucky Bastard
description: Girls and MILFs will meet MCs along the way. Every choice counts. What awaits the MC in the finale? Maybe a harem, or maybe true love?

name: Endless Truck
description: Go on an endless truck ride in this fun driving game! Complete missions at each level. Collect money to buy upgrades. You can earn extra money by performing cool stunts. If you get a perfect landing you get a huge speed boost so aim for those as well. Keep going as long as you don't run out of fuel!

name: Rebels
description:
Hello !!!
Welcome to the Space Rebels game!
The goal of the game is to eliminate all of the enemy spaceships and BOSS at the end of each level.
This is a spaceships shooting java game that was in a motorola cell phone.

name: Jump Boy
description: Platform game for java cell phones in which you must make jumps through different maps using a scope in which we can choose the direction and power of the jump that was preinstalled in some old samsung cellphones.

name: CyTale
description: Cytale is an immersive fantasy multiplayer online game that revolves around a rich lore featuring dragons, adventurers, and the battle against dark forces. Set in a world where dragons were once revered rulers, players embark on quests and challenges to overcome the aftermath of their withdrawal, leading to a world filled with danger and dark magic. The game combines elements of adventure, fantasy, and strategy genres. Its unique features include a captivating storyline, dynamic multiplayer interactions, and a focus on fostering a strong player community. With a seamless blend of exploration, combat, and teamwork, Cytale offers players a chance to engage in an epic journey of cooperation and heroism.

name: Cyber Space Driver
description: This is First Person, Endless Driving game in CyberPunk setting.You can choose any of (4) CyberPunk style maps, Upload your own music, songs, tracks to the Game Radio. Through your way, you be able to see Different, Random, CyberPunk Events.

name: Quicksand
description: Quicksand is a hardcore third-person shooter game that takes you on a thrilling journey through the heart of the Middle East with 26 well designed levels. Set in a war-torn region, the game combines intense action, strategic gameplay, and a gripping storyline to create an unforgettable experience.

name: Slime Climb Scrum
description: If mutual harm is a human instinct, then we want to magnify it infinitely! Slime Climb Scrum can sprinkle a specks of darkness onto you (your) wonderful life! A 2D vertical-axis, high-difficulty jumping game that supports multiplayer cooperation and challenge modes!

name: Thomas the Tank Engine & Friends
description: A cancelled NES port for Thomas the Tank Engine & Friends.

name: Resident Evil 0: Complete Costume Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Scrumpit
description: Scrumpit is a scrabble / crossword style board game for 2, 3 or 4 players, involving tactics, strategy and wordplay with the option of scoring for yourself and/or frustrating other players by stealing their letters.

name: Creepy Clown Zombie Slayer VR
description:
Use your virtual reality headset to experience the thrill of fighting a horde of zombies from the comfort of your own home!
Get ready to defend from zombies in virtual reality! Experience the real sensation and thrill of the undead with your mobile virtual reality headset. Look in the direction you want to shoot your gun and don't get bitten by zombies!

name: Chilly Slide
description:
You can slide, slalom and dash down on skis, snowboards or snow sleds. You can race, chill and meet a bunch of colorful characters!
It’s a whole new chapter of the Geometry Slalom Saga. It’s a Winter Sports Wonderland. Play with one simple game mechanic, experience the game’s “no-frills” infinite variety and enjoy your journey downhill!

name: War Strategy
description: Sin descripción

name: Pizza Maker Game
description:
Try out a brand new cooking game for kids! A pizza game which is funny and educational game! In Pizza Maker Games the kids learn to make pizza in the Cooking Academy!
Did you hear? The masterchef is in town! Here comes the master pizza maker now. It looks like he is troubled…could it be that he is looking for a new cooking assistant? I wonder who will have the honor of working along with such a great cook master. It could be anyone. Well, what are you waiting for? Wake up the pizza master inside you! Hurry up, and download one of the best cooking games there is! It’s pizza time people!
But beware! If you want to become the new master pizza chef you will have to be extra observant and imaginative! In this one of a kind pizza maker games you must remember all the ingredients that the mastercook used on his pizza. Your task is to make pizzas similar to the ones pizza cook made. Enter the Kitchen and make the best pizza with a simple pizza dough recipe. Then use the picture at the top of the screen as your pizza recipe and try to find the ingredients you need in the pizza cookbook. Put as many ingredients as you want and make pizza just by clicking on the pizza dough. When your pizza is ready to be cooked just click on the button in the bottom right corner and your work of art is already in the pizza oven! But don’t get too comfortable, because if you are not quick enough to put it out of the oven, your pizza can be ruined! Learn how to make pizza and have fun playing one of the pizza games!

name: Hidden Object: Detective Agency the Crime of Lord
description: Save yourself and humanity! It’s 1960s England and there's a beautiful 3-floor mansion in the shade of branchy trees. You've travelled for days to reach a castle hidden deep. With a friendly landlord and inexpensive rent, most people would envy those who live here. But bloody things are happening inside of this house. Guests are beheaded, and with every new victim humankind is getting closer to meeting a horrible monster. Is there anyone to prevent this nightmare?

name: Twin Peaks: Into the Night
description: Created as an hommage to good old 90s game classics, Twin Peaks: Into the Night is a fan game adaptation of the eponymous series created by Mark Frost and David Lynch.

name: Sherlock Holmes: The Case of the Hung Parliament
description:
Don your deerstalker and step into the shoes of the world’s most famous sleuth in this gripping 1-4 player mystery detective adventure.

With three cabinet members already murdered by hanging and Sherlock Holmes missing in action, it is up to you to find the killer before Big Ben strikes midnight. Interrogate suspects, analyse crime scenes, collect evidence, and enter your ‘Mind Palace’ to construct a compelling case in this ‘Whodunit’ that will push your deduction skills to their limits. Enjoy this narrative alone or with friends to make this a social sleuthing experience you will never forget.

Combining the worlds of immersive theatre and VR, Sherlock Holmes: The Case of the Hung Parliament’ is a unique ‘evening-sized’ experience that you can enjoy again and again.

Please note: We are a small team and want to create the best possible experience, so any feedback you can share is appreciated. It will help us create an immersive and fun ‘Sherlock’ experience.

name: Moto Racer 4: Rider Pack - Skewer
description: Sin descripción

name: Moto Racer 4: Rider Pack - Space Dasher
description: Sin descripción

name: Moto Racer 4: Rider Pack - The Truth
description: Sin descripción

name: Bum Ball Bears
description: Try to bump the ball past the opposing team.

name: Greatest Dynasties Mahjong
description: The greatest dynasties played this game! From emperors to common people honed their minds through this game. And who knows, maybe that was the key to their success?!

name: Matriarchy Attack
description: Pixel woman character game, you are figthing with abnormal enemies. dystopian platform based story game.

name: Instarion
description: Sci-Fi MMO game in a seamless universe with an emphasis on travel, exploration and quests.

name: Lost and Found
description: Sin descripción

name: Fix Me Up Doc!: Dark Humor
description: This is a parody game with dark humor, with such unbelievable graphics and so intense levels that you can even feel the smell.

name: Junkyard Dive
description: Run, jump, bounce and dive...but don't fall too far! The path is short, but it is very difficult. You will need a high level of strategy to complete the challenges that await you.

name: Parkour
description: Sin descripción

name: EarthX: Future Astronauts Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Punch Club 2: Fast Forward - Deluxe
description: Sin descripción

name: Ether @ Net
description: Unravel the supernatural mysteries in Ether @ Net! As a internet technician, explore a Hong Kong haunted apartments, face otherworldly forces, and team up with a spiritual guide and haunted couple. An exciting blend of mystery and adventure awaits in this thrilling game!

name: Fruit Frenzy
description:
Fruit Frenzy is a one of a kind unique experience for all match 3 game lovers.
Journey through 100 levels with brand new game modes to help save your fruity friends as you battle to defeat the vicious veggies.

name: Give It Up! 3
description:
Increased the difficulty to challenge your limit!
Intensified the rhythm to intrude your pace!
Don’t believe me? Dare you try it?

name: The Visitors from Mir
description:
A fun and easy game for all ages. The Mir aliens have come to Earth along with the Groog. Do they come in peace?
Mastering this game seems easy but to score a perfect game is puzzling unless you are the clever one.
This game carries a message of peace and the only violence in this game is bopping the aliens on the head. No one dies and no gore.
Sounds best with earbuds and is a great game for zoning out and also has a lesson for kids. Game has multiple end game messages based on your performance. Info window has settings for difficulty level and time period (1 to 10 minutes).

name: Puyo Ponyo Lines
description: Join the kawaii puyoponyo! Form a line and clear them now! Many stages are waiting for you!

name: Aya & Naya
description: An Action third-person shooter game

name: Pocket Pix
description: A pixel art animation tool in your pocket

name: Mortal Street Fighter
description: The player takes on the role of a fighter who has to fight enemies that appear on the way. The fight is mostly fisted, only from time to time the player finds some kind of weapon on the stage. The characters in the game have specific designs for fighters.

name: Heir of the Dog
description:
After a mysterious explosion over Victorian London, Cummerbund Bandersnatch (a likeable, if dim-witted twit) visits his uncle's laboratory and discovers an experimental new formula guaranteeing a "good time" for whoever drinks it. Seduced by the promises in his uncle's journal, Cummerbund decides that it is probably safe to drink and discovers his life will never be the same again.

What may seem like a curse at first, leads Bandersnatch on a thrilling, love-torn adventure through the back alleys of Old London Town as he uncovers a sinister plot involving a secret society, the royal family, copious amounts of dog hair and his uncle at the very centre.

name: WWE SmackDown: Shock Value
description: Sin descripción

name: BeatLine
description:
Improvisation, using the rhythm Complete the stage!
If you touch right to move the character to the right.
Touch left side of the character is moved to the left.
Releasing the line returns to the character.
Avoid the obstacles!!!

name: Balance
description: Do you have feel of balance? Try and you will see....

name: Bird Legend
description:
"Bird Legend" is telling your story of heroes fighting vs blocks,bricks,numbers and bombs.
Fresh and original game play, made with honor!
Create your legend now!

name: Fast Diamonds
description: Tap the pink and blue diamonds as fast as you can and test your speed and accuracy as they fall from the sky!

name: Itrill
description:
You may become a string player or music conductor...
This game added both western and eastern music. Besides, you can also play with your own iPod music.It brings you entirely new experience with more fun.

name: Jazz Smash
description:
Tap to Smash!
Hit everything and enjoy the sweet music of destruction
Level up to unlock more items and new bats

name: NoteBlaster
description: NoteBlaster is a retro-arcade inspired video game that takes you on a musical journey through space. Using the piano keyboard and drum pad interfaces, you can blast notes to your heart's content as you boost your proficiency with the musical language. Players can use any clef, making it the perfect practice tool for musicians of all types!

name: Shady Wars
description: Why be a king, when you can be a god? Rap God is now in Shady Wars, developed in partnership with Shady Records. Earn your Rap God props in 135 battles with Rap God and 14 more Shady hits or play in Ken Mode for max protection. MTV News calls it “addictive and fun” for any music fan. It’s a must-have for all true Stans.

name: Song of Hero: Music RPG
description: The game that will break all your stereo types of previous game experiences. Song of Hero will guide you to the Epic Musical Fantasy You've Never Experienced!

name: Space Inversion
description: Space Inversion is the classic arcade Space Invader style shooter. Battle the invading aliens from outer space.

name: The Weapon King
description:
Warrior! Please be awake!
The world is in danger! Now Hurry!!
Evil spirits from the dark dimension are giving everyone a trouble!
Take this sword at once and forge the greatest sword!

name: Slime Warrior
description: You are the Warrior on a quest to find and defeat the Slime Gladiator. With a limited movement, you need to think carefully about every step until you reach the door. Use your special power, push boxes, find keys, beware of traps, and slay every slime that get in your way!

name: Only Jump!
description: Only Jump is a timed vertical climber, jump by pressing space or A on your controller. Race to get to the top in the fastest time.

name: A World of Wishes
description: Nicole has been traumatized by the murder of her mother and father. Haunted by images of a memory she can't recall. Follow Nicole and Gabby's lives as they try and put the pieces together that are tearing at them daily. Something or someone is lurking out in the darkness. Waiting.

name: The Legend of Zelda Remastered
description: While this one is not a full remake of Zelda games like what happen to Link’s Awakening, but rather a remastered of The Legend of Zelda original game released for NES back in 1986 to HD using the latest and closest graphics, music and sound to newer Legend of Zelda games, this game is certainly not something to be missed for all Zelda fans and especially to those who never really have a chance playing the original game.

name: NPOZ The Game
description:
A FPS game that you will shoot and kill people with diffrent gamemodes
you can level up and buy guns

name: Puppy Drome
description: A game made for the minild educational compo.

name: Mankind
description: You awake on a cold and desolate world. Surrounding you are ruined and unfamiliar shores; shores that must belong to the world you called home. Explore your surroundings, and venture through odd landscapes. If you look hard enough, maybe you’ll uncover glimpses of the past, hidden just out of view.

name: Plunder: Scourge of the Sea
description: Challenge the malevolent Scourge in Plunder Scourge of the Sea, an immersive MMO pirate adventure. PvP battles, PvE quests, and a race against the curse's evil influence. Unite, craft, build, and rise as a hero to cleanse the seas. Will you succumb or conquer? The fate of all pirates awaits!

name: Lord of the Race
description: Welcome to a Horror Open World, Story-Driven, Racing RPG Game. You have shipwrecked on Carbon Crest Island. The Deal is Sealed. Either, Race and Win through the deadly race trials set up by the deranged Count Levoy OR Lose & Suffer an eternity under his mercy.

name: The Mirror Dimension
description: The Mirror Dimension is a co-op story-based thriller game that can be played with 2-4 people. The objective of the game is to observe paranormal activity in the house you are visiting as a guest, destroy the incoming spiritual beings. Are you ready to explore the parallel universe?

name: Rc Plane 2
description: Introducing the most realistic RC Plane game and sim for iOS with 6 new game modes, 17 planes to pick from and Game Center achievement and leaderboard integration. The graphics and gameplay in this universal app are stunning and optimized across a range of supported Apple devices with specific optimizations for iPhone 4 Retina Display and both iPad and iPad 2. C

name: Battleship Lonewolf
description:
Flight through space, command your ship, and wage epic war in galaxy.
Five star space tower defense shooter!

name: A Date for the Ages
description: A Date for the Ages is a short, adult visual novel filled with humor, alternate endings, several animations, and CGs.

name: Planet Valley
description: Overview: Manage resources and defend your base against alien attacks. Design: Build structures, collect resources and defend your colony with defense towers. Automation lets you focus on strategy.

name: Abysswalkers
description:
Abysswalkers is a competitive and tactical trading card game.

Being inspired by Tetramaster and Hearthstone, Abysswalkers has similarities to most popular games within the genre that players may be familiar with while also bringing a fun and interesting twist to the gameplay forcing players to strategize and think a little differently than they may be used to.

Set within the Grim Syndicate universe after it was marred by the Daemon Scourge, you will be able to open packs to collect different Daemon and Rune cards to build decks for your Grim Summoner to battle and compete with other Grims that have decided to explore the forbidden wonders of the Abyssal Plane.

Collect, Trade, and Battle to prove you are the greatest Abysswalker within the ETA.

name: Who Killed the Streamer?
description: Investigate the murder of a famous streamer and find out who the killer is, but beware of people who don't like you meddling.

name: Biosmose
description: To address the sterility of the world, a single seed can change everything. Blending contemplation and puzzle-solving, Biosmose is a game that invites you to revitalize depleted environments. Sow, discover, and learn to sustain various plants in this colorful universe.

name: The City of Fury
description: The City of fury is a SWAT-like team management RTS set in a dystopian Cyberpunk-Noir setting, where you play as the team leader who gets involve in shady matters. Explore the themes of violence as you face the harsh city with your team to ultimately break free from the circle!

name: SideQuest: Reanimated
description: SideQuest is a side-scrolling action RPG that takes you headfirst into a challenging adventure with a band of delightfully unconventional heroes. Play solo or with friends as you conquer quests, collect loot, craft devious custom builds, and press forward towards our heroes' inescapable destiny!

name: The Backrooms Project
description: "The Backrooms Project" is an exciting solo/multiplayer horror game with infinite levels and lots of puzzles. Explore the almost endless levels alone or with friends, solve exciting puzzles, hide from monsters that won't shy away from killing you, try to escape.

name: Menyr
description: Create immersive worlds in seconds and play with friends in Menyr's storytelling engine. Generate dungeons, change biomes, and enjoy AAA graphics. Fully customizable, community-driven, and free, Menyr brings your TTRPG adventures to life in a seamless and immersive virtual tabletop experience.

name: Nightzoid
description: Nightzoid is a single-player, horror-puzzle indie game. Try to find out the mystery before death catches you.

name: Guns and Donuts
description: Donuts! and Guns!? Choose from a host of Donut! characters (each with multiple unique Guns!) and traverse wonderfully large locations in search for more Donut! companions. Fight through hordes of miscellaneous enemies by using either your Guns!, your Donuts!, or your puzzle solving skills!

name: Dungeon Crawl Tower Run
description: Single player 3D action roguelike extraction game. Create unique builds out of various combinations of skills and equipments to reach the 6th floor of the Tower!

name: Culture House
description: Culture House is a nurturing + adventure game based on biological cultivation experiments. Set in a building influenced by 20th-century modernist houses, the game portrays serene and strange days, unravels the mysteries hidden behind the experiments, and culminates in the arrival of the apocalypse.

name: Magma Fever
description: "Magma Fever" is a 2D pixel-style mining action-adventure game. You will pilot a mech and dig into an underground volcanic world. Complete missions and confront enemies in various environment, overcome disasters like earthquakes and lava surges, bring back ores to upgrade your mech at the base.

name: Rowtropia
description: Travel to the pixelated world of Rowtropia, engulfed by a mysterious infeсtion, explore its mysteries and save it from imminent destruction.

name: The House on Ninth Avenue
description: Explore the house and surrounding garden to uncover clues and to find a way out.

name: Football City
description: Manage your team in this voxel based football (soccer) management simulator. Make active decisions directly influencing the events in the match. Can you win the league?

name: Forbidden Tapes
description: Forbidden Tapes is a game consisting of three different horror stories. In the first episode, discover Jeremy Winterroad's recording, an urban exploration enthusiast searching for abandoned places full of stories. He won't be disappointed when he explores the old McNale house.

name: Vapor Up! With Man with Apple
description: Have you ever wanted to play a video game? Well, how about playing this one? Run and jump like a parkour master and save your dog from rats. You are robot from a vaporwave ghetto. Sounds cool, right?

name: Hatone
description: Embark on an Action-Platformer with metroidvania elements odyssey as an Illuminati henchman. Navigate treacherous realms, battle fearsome bosses, overcome obstacles, and unravel secrets in an ancient castle. Fulfill your destiny, but beware: the Illuminati's intentions may not align with your own.

name: Phobia Exposure VR
description: Phobia Exposure VR offers immersive exposure therapy in virtual reality. Conquer your fears with gradual levels of exposure, guided relaxation, and personal progress tracking. Overcome phobias at your own pace!

name: Expedition Wildlife
description: Step foot on a wondrous expedition! Explore Wildlife, an rich open world full of adventure. Help the inhabitants of Wildlife to restore its former glory. With a unique cartoony art style, immersive story, and challenging platform levels. Are you ready for the ultimate adventure?

name: Purrfect Survivors
description: Kill monsters, Gather paws, then you will be stronger and stronger! Purrfect Survivors is a roguelite game, which you need to get runes and arrange them against the thousands of monsters. Every rune has its own ability and it shows completely different ability depending on where you arrange it.

name: Abandoning Spies
description: "Abandoning Spies" is an intense Metroidvania adventure. As Agent Pierce, navigate a complex world, master movement and gunplay, and unravel a deceptive underworld crime web. Inspired by characters Lazzy, Jasper, and Claire, will you uncover the truth?

name: Terralora
description: Terralora is a simple Rogue-lite where you traverse a shattered world to overthrow a tyrannical kingdom. Take on the role of a chaotic little knight: Skye, as you explore procedurally generated zones filled with secrets, mysteries, and many untold treasures!

name: Morigami
description: Enter the Japanese spirit realm while controling the young girl Mori and her origami companion simultaneously! On the quest to find Mori’s little sister, they need to combine their strengths and make use of the ability to change Origami into different forms with varying skills.

name: Jezebel: Givin' Love a Shot
description: An old-school horizontal shoot 'em up, heavily inspired by the arcade classics of the 90's!

name: Wirewalker
description: A first-person platform game with puzzle elements immersed in a mysterious realm of glittering wires. The player must explore and conquer the maps by exploiting resources, using logic, casting powers, facing entities and interacting with the environment.

name: Angular Velocity
description: Ultimate Frisbee in Spaaaacceee!!!!

name: Parafron
description: Unravel dark secrets, confront inner demons, and shape the haunting narrative in this psychological thriller. Your choices define the gripping, first-person journey - will you unravel the truth or succumb to madness?

name: Alien Land
description: This is a special simulation tower defense game, where you need to command each citizen to build a base. To produce food, one also needs to resist monsters from the night!

name: Kingdom Simulator
description: Build, rule, and conquer in this immersive Kingdom Simulator. Shape your medieval realm, manage resources, navigate challenges, and strategize for the prosperity of your kingdom. Will you be a benevolent monarch or a cunning conqueror?

name: Lost Oath
description: A Souls-like platformer with Roguelike elements.

name: Tetrocombat
description: Tetrocombat is a sci-fi, falling block, roguelike. Select your hexmaster and battle the mighty protojinz by combining falling "tetroes" infused with powerful hexes into lines to deal damage. Upgrade your hexmaster with unique effects to radically enhance your strategy and defeat the protojinz.

name: Cult of the Call
description: Cult of the Call is an Action RPG game with RTS elements where you summon and command minions. You take the role of a cult summoner and necromancer, customizing an elemental deck of cards to build an army of units while gaining the favors of the Old Gods.

name: Jamboy: A Jelly-cious Hero
description: Jamboy and Billy need to get out of a giant’s belly, who’s swallowed them! Explore a fleshy laberynth, in this crazy action-platformer, while defeating dangerous food monsters and finding a way out! Do you have the guts to do it?

name: The Jusou
description: "The Jusou series", renowned as the most terrifying horror escape game in the history of smartphones, is now available on Steam! Many players have abandoned their games due to the sheer terror it instills! *Please play at your own risk if you experience any unusual phenomena after playing this game.

name: Cat at Home
description: This is a 2D side-scrolling puzzle game with a cat as the main character. The game takes place in a villa, where you play as a cat that has just entered the house. You meet animals with different personalities, solve one problem after another, and finally resolve the crisis at home.

name: GoSickRogue
description: Sin descripción

name: Maze of Fear
description: Embark on a thrilling adventure through mysterious worlds, conquering obstacles and unraveling intriguing puzzles. Immerse yourself in minimalist graphics and uncover secrets in this unique gaming experience. Get ready for surprises!

name: Handmancers
description: Handmancers is a first-person roguelike deckbuilder set in a crazy fantasy world where warriors solve their problems through the power of their hands… literally.

name: Tales of Mist
description: Tales of Mist is a survival game integrating strategy and adventure in a decaying world. Plagued by the presence of witches and the tyranny of creatures straight out of fairy tales, take command of a city to bring light to this fog-filled world.

name: The Blue Stars
description: The Blue Stars is a strategy RPG where you can bond with weird alien party members. It features simple yet deep strategy combat and a lot of characters and enemies.

name: Closing Time
description: A first person psychological horror game with a heavy focus on a rich story with hidden secrets to uncover. Take control on the night of a burglary of a superstore. Navigate puzzles and evade and hide from the horrors as you desperately try to escape with your life.

name: War of Being
description: War of Being is a single-player VR sci-fi adventure with standard mode playability, based on the music and concept for TesseracT's 2023 full length album. Explore 'The Strangeland' filled with surreal landscapes and characters. Solve puzzles and find hidden objects that unlock TesseracT's new music.

name: GameDev Trash
description: GameDevTrash is a highly unconventional game.Each level presents a new genre for you to experience: shooter, open-world RPG, horror,and much more! The game's plot revolves around the modern gaming industry and its peculiarities. All of this is mixed with a slightly insane storyline and trashy humor.

name: Slingshot Protocol
description: Slingshot Protocol is a fast-paced retro first-person shooter with intense combat, large arsenal of weapons and agile source-based movement. Navigate a variety of levels, from sci-fi facilities to a desolate and violent alien world. Fighting against fast and highly aggressive enemies.

name: Molt
description: Molt is a turn-based deckbuilding card game in the vein of Hearthstone, Dominion and Wingspan. It aims to be educational and fun, with realistic depictions of snake species.

name: Vortix
description: What do you get when you combine marbles with a battle royale ring and PvP? Vortix! Vortix is an online competitive game where the objective is to knock your opponent or opponents out of the shrinking ring!

name: Jank Cube VR
description: Jank Cube is a fun VR physics sandbox filled to the brim with cool unique objects for you to interact with using the fully physically simulated player rig in maps made from the ground up for VR.

name: Sex with the Devil 2
description: The dwarfs from hell broke loose, the pursuit of the sinful soul began. They will torment her, enjoying the fading hope...

name: Harma
description: Harma began with the belief of humans overcoming hardships. We have created an immensely challenging strategic card game that befits this theme. If you are someone who doesn't shy away from life's trials and faces them head-on, this game is for you.

name: Will.exe
description: Will.exe, a game whose character no longer wants to be played. Not anymore.

name: RV Kingdom 0x0297
description: Save the world from the upcoming demon invasion or join the evil forces! Gather a party of gangsters and kick ass! Explore the world within three years and prepare for the great battle that will change the history forever!

name: Roanoke
description: Uncover the dark secrets of the lost colony in this gripping action-adventure/survival horror game. Step into the shoes of a desperate survivor trapped on Roanoke Island, where the boundaries between history and the supernatural blur. Beware the lurking horrors that lie within the shadows.

name: A Creature's Journey
description: A peculiar creature finds themself alone with no memory of their past and a strong desire to find purpose for the future. After embarking on a journey to seek out answers with the aid of a mysterious traveler, hope turns to fear when an uncovered secret threatens the world.

name: Bird Watching Simulator
description: An avid bird watching simulator with realistic watching mechanics. Grab your binoculars and build your attention span, Bird Watching Simulator is an unbelievably relaxing and interactive game that draws you so close to nature, it feels like you're apart of it.

name: Frogreign
description: Leap into Frogreign! Set forth as Rill, an exiled prince traversing the wild depths of their kingdom as they unravel a royal conspiracy. Master your agility, sword, and sticky tongue to defeat wild beasts and explore ancient dungeons in this swashbuckling, amphibious action-adventure!

name: This is a Small Town
description: A trainee police officer arrives in a strange small town, but unexpectedly falls into a conspiracy. What happens during the process of investigating the truth?

name: Nano Citizens
description: Nano Citizens, the city-building game that takes simulation to new heights! Dive into a world where you have the power to micro-manage every aspect of your metropolis. Influence the lives of virtual citizens, shaping their careers, and witnessing the profound impact of your decisions.

name: Fate and Judgement
description: Fate and Judgement is a vertical shoot'em up with roguelike elements and procedural stage generation. Fight Through hordes of an empire you once served and relieve your last mission until victory is yours!

name: The Prospector Odyssey
description: A lonely trek to a desolate planet unearths a strange anomaly, seemingly causing denizens of a nearby station to become horrifying, violent mutants. Run, think, scavenge and improvise. Only the smartest will survive.

name: Maschinen Dolls
description: Join Wyverniah and her Mythroid Doll friends, fighting Monstroid on 2.5D side scrolling battlefield and explore the world as tiny cute toys. Customize your favorite Mythoroid according to your taste, show your styles and utilize the cool and powerful arsenals in battle to save the world !

name: Etos
description: A Pacifist Immersive Sim set in an underground city. Be slippery, be stealthy or cause chaos as you evade, hack and disrupt your way to the surface in this intricately designed fps stealth experience, where getting spotted is half the fun

name: Eastern Front
description: Eastern Front is a semi realistic multiplayer game combining real time strategy and boots to the ground fps combat. Generals command their divisions and manage war industry while soldiers go to the battle with equipment given to them.

name: Bunny Revenge
description: Immerse yourself in a fantastical realm where cuddly creatures and vibrant landscapes come to life. Join Coco on his unforgettable adventure and immerse yourself in a world where dreams and technology collide. Don’t miss out on the ultimate plushy adventure!

name: Hyperons
description: The plan is to go into early access at the end of 2024. Because I'm working solo on the project and it's difficult to estimate some of the workload. It's my first project and I'm trying to give you a good gaming experience and a game that you enjoy playing.

name: Apocalypse: Zombie City
description: A third person shooter set in a zombie-infested city that, if left unresolved, will lead to the apocalyptic end of humanity.

name: Black Powder Desolation
description: Fight your way past the law with up to 3 of your friends in a coop campaign containing a variety of distinct locations and gameplay rewarding teamplay and cooperation, or master a variety of weapon classes against other players in thrilling battles featuring up to 24 players.

name: Chemical Sort
description: Chemical Sort is a science-themed casual puzzle in which you unscramble various colored chemicals by sorting them into their own test tubes.

name: Tetris Bliss
description: Are you ready to challenge the block fun and explore the wonderful world of Meitu? Come experience this addictive Tetris game eliminate blocks, collect gift boxes, and uncover the secrets of Meitu!

name: Ecosphere
description: An apprentice engineer inherits an orb capable of controlling nature to prevent the advent of a world where humans and machines become one.

name: Glixel
description: Each Entity has a role to play... A reason why it is created... Something weird is going on in the Core... maybe an opportunity to do what she was made for?

name: Zombie Sanctuary: Arelia
description: This is a fun 3D mowing magic battle game. Very decompression, press a few keys, move the mouse can feel a pleasant game experience.

name: Mechanic 8230: Mission Citytone
description: Mechanic 8230: Episode 2 is the continuation of the point-and-click adventure of Vigo and his robotic friend RO-2, as they uncover the secrets of the space station Сitytone this time.

name: Last Round
description: Focus... Aim... Draw!

name: Hues of Hope: A Painter's Tale
description: Hues of Hope is a colorful adventure where you play as a painter on a mission to recolor the world using elemental magic. Solve puzzles, explore Chromacia, and prepare for thrilling encounters with evil that can only be defeated by using colors and their corresponding elements to restore harmony.

name: Corrupt
description: Survive in a dark and atmospheric action-platformer characterized by environments full of mystery and fearsome enemies.

name: Blobbers
description: A community of blobfish have been displaced from their homes by a storm. Collect your friends and bring them home!

name: Traxion 2
description: Welcome to Traxion 2! Again you take the role of a daring starship pilot, embarking on a series of break-neck missions into the caves of a dangerous alien planet. This time around, you can join forces with a second player, or challenge each other in deadly deathmatch mode!

name: Golfstacle! Minigolf
description:
This is minigolf the way it's meant to be played!
Forget about the wacky clown heads and spinning windmills. This is the pure sport in it's truest fashion!

name: Savvy Fisher
description:
Enjoy the most epic of epic saga about Love, Wisdom and Fishing! Yet keep in mind that fishing is power... and fishing is addictive!
A story full of humor, addictive gameplay, beautiful and tasty colorful fishes, awesome loving wife and insanely evil Rainbow Moray. An entertaining modern take on match-three puzzle genre.

name: Jungle Munchers
description:
Battle jungle munchers to eat the most munchies in a series of gut-wrenching challenges.
Use weapons of mass digestion for a munching boost.

name: Jumpy Clash
description:
Jumpy Clash is an intense action packed one touch game with non-stop explosive action.
Clash through geometry hurdles at great pace. You will be moving very fast and have to Colour Switch quickly to go further. Tap the jumpy ball through obstacles and be very careful. To cross the obstacle the color of ball should be the same as the color of obstacle. If the colors don’t match and you try to cross, you’ll have to start all over again. So keep an eye on the color patterns and switch color if you have to.
Dive into this simple one touch controls game to top the leaderboards.

name: Emma the Cat: Fruit Mania
description:
Emma the Cat: Fruit Mania is a new match 3 game with talking cat Emma as the main character, who will guide you through the levels and watch you make progress. If you are a fan of fruit splash games, you will certainly have fun with this one. Download Emma the Cat: Fruit Mania matching game and enjoy this fruit blast adventure!
There hardly is a person who once wasn't addicted to a certain match 3 game.

name: Under the bed
description: Under the Bed is a spine-chilling horror game that will take you on a nightmarish journey into the depths of fear.

name: Cave of Evil
description: Cave of Evil is a horror game in which a desperate father becomes obsessed with recovering his daughter who died in an accident through a strange ritual.

name: Puppetmaster
description: Discover a metroidvania with a huge world, platform-fighter dynamic combat, smart bosses, deep lore, and original music, all made by two brothers.

name: Gassy Choose Your Own Adventure Weirdo
description: you play some guy from the moon who farts a lot and his arch-rival is some guy just called Nerdy Guy who makes evil robots to conquer the world or something.

name: The Way
description: "The Way" is sci-fi third or first person physics based real-time action adventure game with character customization.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Awakening - Scenario: "Battle of Tetorigawa"
description: The dragon of Echigo makes his move to defeat Nobunaga.

name: ROFL
description: The ultimate mash-up of Reversed Bullet Hell and Tower Defense! Rage of Fluffy Looters is a game where you play as a cat and must fight off hordes of monsters with your towers. Protect your fur and unleash your furious rage!

name: Assault Shell 2
description: A high-risk, high reward shoot em up as you power yourself and your enemies up to bring utter chaos to the battlefield!

name: Astro Heist
description: Launch into the exhilarating world of Astro Heist, an asymmetric PVP Screen vs. VR game of cunning and infiltration set within bustling space outposts. Blend into the environment and sneak through challenging missions, but beware, the VR watcher is vigilant and one false move could give you away!

name: Yarashii Hotel
description: Welcome to Yarashii Hotel, a place where all your dreams will become real! Explore hundreds of procedurally generated rooms while you meet all kind of entities eager to satisfy all of your desires! But beware! Some of them will try to catch you and make you stay in the hotel forever...

name: Coco
description: This is a single player exploration and decryption type of game, the player controls the young magician in the map to find the exit, the way may have to explore a variety of props, acquire a variety of skills, in order to successfully find the exit.

name: Jet Soccer
description: Jet Soccer delivers thrilling, physics-based soccer matches. Steer your aircraft, perform swift maneuvers, and score epic goals in minimalist, yet vivid arenas! Enjoy competitive fun with friends locally or online.

name: Myth of the Moirai
description: Fight off the horde and collect loot as you make your way through a dynamically created world and find a way to end the scourge of evil in this land.

name: Terre Scramble!
description: Terre is a merchant doing business in the city, and in order to earn more money, she often ventures into the labyrinth. However, the labyrinth is fraught with danger...

name: Cozy Space
description: "Cozy Space" is a relaxing home decoration game with true-to-life models and rooms. Enjoy a leisurely gaming experience and easily create cozy spaces. It cleverly blends music elements, allowing you to be a composer, interior designer, or simply relax without specific tasks!

name: Sanguine
description: Sanguine tells the story of Yona, a cursed warrior in her quest for revenge a she battles her way through a dry medieval world filled with blood powered machine.

name: I'm Just a Slime
description: A dragon has moved in on a nearby mountain, causing havok in the surrounding ecosystems. A slime is chosen to go on a journey to confront the dragon in order to save their home. But will they be successful? After all, they are just a slime.

name: In The Ruined Courtyard
description: Text adventure games. The story happened in the British Isles in the 16th century. Players will experience the storyline from the perspectives of Brand and Lev, exploring personal stories in 16th century British society.

name: APlaceDominatedByHoles
description: Turn-based role-playing game to help the protagonist find the truth

name: Infection X
description: Join the viral adventure in this arcade-style game. Play as a virus, infect cells, defeat antibodies, and solve puzzles to collect RNA points. Navigate through lung, cell, and nuclear challenges, facing unique enemies and a thrilling boss battle. Get ready for a contagious gaming experience!

name: Dead End Mission
description: The humans fled for their life! Now only aliens remain in the city. Your name is Mark, a professional marksman. You have one mission, to kill the alien Queen! Your helicopter buddy will provide you with supplies during the mission. But this will not be easy...

name: Human Wall Simulator
description: All is about humans forming a wall, and breaking it! Gather your people and stand hand in hand. Hold up against rushing enemy. Explore wall scenarios and watch the humans fight in a real-time physics simulation playground.

name: Bonfire Kingdom
description: Bonfire Kingdom is a cosy city builder mixed with RPG elements in a dark medieval fantasy world - like a hauntingly beautiful German fairy tale. Superior enemies are creeping out of the darkness. Protect your village by leading your band of loyal knights into battle.

name: Cocktail Magic
description: A human drama novel game set in a bar with the theme of "companion". Enjoy the "Speak Easy" atmosphere that mixes the liveliness of a bar with the stylishness of a bar.

name: SCP: Josie
description: SCP: Josie is a game about a cat that is not all there, literally. Set in the expansive and collaboratively-created SCP universe, you play as an anomalous cat named Josie, or her more official designation: SCP-529.

name: HoneySun
description: HoneySun is a CASUAL FARMING and DATING SIMULATOR. Grow crops, fall in love with numerous amazing characters, and explore unique game mechanics in a vibrant SANDBOX OPEN WORLD!

name: Crusaders Arena
description: Embark on an epic journey in Crusaders Arena, a multiplayer battleground where you mold your hero with unique loadouts and abilities. Engage in intense game modes, or perfect your skills in the practice range. Lead your team to glory, and dominate the battlefield in this action-packed crusade!

name: Goblins Please
description: The dark lord has tasked you to decide which heroes pass and which heroes do not. There are becoming too many papers and to top it off the camp with the other goblins will not last long without you. Decide who passes through during the day and manage the camp at night.

name: Dumbriel: Magnificent Adventure in Hell
description: Embark on an epic journey through Dante's 9 circles of hell as clumsy angel Dumbriel, whose mission is to reclaim the souls you lost. Explore angelic and infernal skills, collect shards, craft elixirs, and battle formidable creatures in this Metroidvania-style action adventure.

name: Ablaze
description: Experience a delightful, full-of-action, 2-player local co-op adventure of Ablaze, where you'll throw and activate objects to solve puzzles, tumble over obstacles to save adorable sheep and take down Scorch, the troublemaking fire spirit.

name: Bloodthief
description: Bloodthief is an ultra-fast melee dungeon-runner where you use momentum to parkour through hazardous dungeons and brutally slash through enemies. Speed-run through medieval dungeons and castles and learn what dark secrets lie beneath the surface.

name: A Dino Date
description: A game where you play as a velociraptor finding love. You are expected to craft, harvest, and create items using a variety of methods. Players must have a keen eye and be willing to monitor stats such as their health and energy - finding love is hard work!

name: G-ump
description: Do you have what it takes to complete the level and make it to the end, jumping and completing different obstacles? It's simple, you have to double jump to be able to complete all the parkour, good luck jumper

name: Ardem
description: Prepare for an immersive open-world survival experience. Scavenge, collect resources, craft tools and build your own shelter to overcome the challenges of survival in this harsh environment.

name: Shop Is Done
description: Shop Is Done — Story-driven 3D Tactics-Horror game with microgames. Move employees from task to task, satisfy customers, and follow the rules of the capricious clown puppet manager. Stay out of debt! Or face eternity as a lifeless puppet.

name: Heart.HalfHalf
description: This game is a casual strategy game that requires players to overcome multiple challenges and connect with beautiful girls' hearts. Players need to operate the two sides of the heart and guide them to reach the destination at the same time, in order to win the heart of the girl.

name: Valor & Victory: Kursk
description: In an effort to reverse their fortunes in Russia, the Germans committed their best forces to the Battle of Kursk. However, they were met with an unyielding Russian defense.

name: Madcus Show
description: Discover the mystery behind Marcus Circus, the world's first circus with infinite energy generated by a mysterious crystal. You will have to try to survive by hiding, exploring, and solving puzzles.

name: Nature
description: Nature is Calling. From the publishers of the award-winning Evolution series comes a new expandable game system: Nature, where players create and adapt species in an ecosystem that changes as they play. Expansions are easy to add on and combinable, making for endless new ecosystems to explore.

name: Chester: Into The Darkness
description: After being thrown into the trash, Chester has to fight his way back home while learning to face the darker side of himself.

name: Birnchen & Friends: Minor Confrontations
description: Visit Pear and Mr. Blue in their playroom and fight each other for a bowl of candy in this colorful RTS! Whether it's fruity attack or stormy chaos, you choose the side!

name: The Owl, the Thief and the Strawberries
description: An adventure platformer focused on stealth and exploration.

name: Spirit of Meda
description: Spirit of Meda is a Pixel Art Adventure game, set in a world open for exploration and self-discovery. You will play as a young Traveller with the freedom to explore the vast and beautiful world of Meda at your own pace.

name: Project ST
description: Jump into the madcap world of Project ST, a free online multiplayer party shooter stuffed with colorful characters, wacky weapons, massive robots, and fast-paced battles!

name: Making people to Fight Qin
description: "Making people to Fight Qin" is a set of three fire + tower defense + strategy and other gameplay of the individual sketch, you can build a variety of Mohist wooden armor people, formed different team linups, these wooden armor people can evolve to different branches.

name: RunOut: Hothead Paws
description: RunOut is an online party platformer game for 2 to 6 players! Pick a cute animal character, race through unpredictable obstacle courses, collect coins, and be the first to grab the stuffed bear. Prepare for a fun, fast-paced mix of running, fighting, and partying!

name: Dead Underground
description: Dead Underground is a sci-fi survival game with RPG elements inspired by horror movies and the game Dead Space

name: Garganta
description: 'Garganta' is a 3D Platformer influenced by Tsutomu Nihei's works. Embody Servo, an android racing to neutralise a device that'll engulf the Universe in innumerable singularities. Encounter peculiar characters and unveil secret plots designed by an AI, maddened by horrors it was never meant to witness.

name: In Wonderland
description: InWonderland is a healing casual puzzle game. Enjoy it leisurely.

name: TetherGeist
description: TetherGeist is a 2D Precision Platformer about Mae, a young villager with a mysterious illness that has turned her right of passage into a treacherous journey. Join Mae in her struggle to prove herself as you make your way to a mystical temple using powers of astral projection.

name: Chess Undress
description: Chess Undress is a 2D pixel chess game with a uniqe anime highschool storyline.

name: Freedom Tower
description: Roleplaying set in a dystopian universe inspired by early twentieth-century wars and Ukrainian folklore. You are seventeen-year-old Orest, and you might be the last hope of your land occupied by the Black Empire.

name: Galactic Starforce
description: Join the interstellar journey in "Galactic Starforce", a visual novel where you, the cadet, navigate a colorful crew in their quest to keep the cosmos sexy. Choose your alliances and find love amongst the stars!

name: Harvest on Jupiter
description:
Harvest on Jupiter is a simple, beautiful and relaxing, sci-fi puzzle game.
Harvest the energized cube from the Jupiter Tree with the force field of Harvest plasma ball by placing it close to the cube.

name: Citron World Forward: Zero
description: Citron World is an action RPG in which players explore a 2D map, switching between characters with transformable weapons in a world bizarrely developed by a substance called "Citron". Become the "Seeker" and manipulate the search weapon "ArmoND" to find out the truth about the world.

name: The Revenge of Tungsten
description: Bullet shooter with no visible bullets

name: Kingdoms Rise and Fall
description: Kingdoms Rise and Fall is a captivating Real-Time Strategy game that takes you on an epic journey through different eras, spanning the entirety of history and beyond!

name: Fattening Career
description: Welcome to Fattening Career, a Visual Novel that centers around feeding, weight gain, and a touch of breast expansion. In this game, you’ll have the opportunity to become an A+ Feeder, a chocolatier, a lab researcher, and more.

name: Milfvania Ep. 3
description: Encompass the whole story in this largest and final episode. Graduate from the so-called "KGB University" by building your harem. Don't mind the atmospheric, decaying background. The girls will make up for it!

name: Touhou: The Unreachable Oneiroborder
description: “The Unreachable Oneiroborder” is a beginner-friendly Touhou-styled Bullet Hell shmup. Indulge in a uniquely Touhou experience with intricate patterns and stylish effects.

name: Unease
description: UNEASE is a 1 to 4 players co-op survival horror game presenting an array of episodes with innovative mechanics and different settings.

name: Juna: The Dreamwalker
description: Immerse yourself in a captivating retro-style adventure. Utilize the transformative power of the rod to take on the appearance and abilities of monsters and objects. Unravel the dark origins of the monstrous invasion and discover the secrets behind the ancient portal.

name: Squares and Stuff
description: Build, experiment, and share in Squares and Stuff, a pixel-retro sandbox game inspired by classic "falling sand" games. Unleash your creativity in an open-ended world filled with sandbox elements like water, paint, fire, sand, animals, humans, zombies, and a controllable 2D platform character.

name: Platformer Helmet
description: Achaapur is taken hostage by a local gangster Gundam. You are the only hope left. Each helmet has a unique super power. Switch between different helmets to use those powers. Fight against different goons of Gundam. A Platformer game that has fights and platforming action.

name: Gelatinous: Humanity Lost
description: Gelatinous is a platforming adventure with deep roots in games like Mega Man, Metroid, Castlevania, and other classics.

name: Demise: Survival Uncharted
description: Survive Or Die. it's in the name. Welcome to a solo developed, online multiplayer survival game. From the shades of Rust and The Forest: build, craft, survive, and raid! Coming soon in early 2024 from Modern Monkey Studios.

name: Stepan's Life
description: A simulator of the life of a Russian, where the player must develop his character and make decisions that affect his fate. The player must solve various puzzles and tasks to advance through the story.

name: Time of the Wizard
description: Time of the Wizard is a Magic-Casting, Bullet-Hell, Dungeon-Crawler where you will: Burn, Poison, Freeze, Explode, Electrocute and Melt through hordes of enemies by casting your OWN spells. Take back the Wizard's stolen magical tome and destroy the remnants of the Monster King's army!

name: One Last Tale
description: The game allows 4 to 10 players to experience co-op and betrayal. You must comlete tasks while bewaring of the monsters among you. Whether to make best of your social deception and reasoning skills or just play it as a crazy party game is all up to you!

name: Squiigee
description: Use your momentum to swing, launch and fly, cleaning cityscapes in record time to earn some sweet, sweet cash!

name: Garbage Country
description: Drive through a pixel art 3D wasteland. Explore vast procedural terrains dotted with hand-crafted landmarks, each holding echoes of a forgotten past.

name: Seas of Kahtaone
description: A fantasy naval combat action-adventure game. Explore the open ocean and fend off pirates with your cannon broadsides and magical arsenal. Summon the wind to boost your ship forward and release fireballs to light up your enemies. Upgrade your ships armor, weapons, and much more to win the day.

name: Food Truck Time Machine
description: Imagine if you were in a food truck that could travel through time! Your journey will span over 2 millennium with 5 different time periods each with its own set of customers and food. You are the time travelling food chef but can you cook your way home!

name: Aurora Adventure: A Space Academy Tale
description: Get ready for an unforgettable adventure! Before You is an exciting space saga about the adventures of the cadets of the Academy of the Interstellar Order.

name: Blight Bubbles
description: Embark on an singleplayer first person physics puzzle adventure in Blight Bubbles. Shoot bubbles, explore, defeat enemies and bosses and solve puzzles to restore the blighted world. Upgrade your bubble gun with new abilities like the ice ray to freeze bubbles into platforms.

name: S: Lost Chapters
description: Prepare for a brand-new type of horror. Delve deeper into the depths of infamous stories once told and unearth the terrible secrets left behind. Brace yourself for an immersive journey that is equal parts horrifying and breathtaking. An experience that is both familiar, yet different…

name: Where Beasts Were Born
description: Where Beasts Were Born is an experimental Action-RPG with evolving creatures. As the creatures fight the players, they use a genetic algorithm to evolve unique, stronger evolutionary stages, including body, stats and brain - procedurally!

name: Tense
description: Tense is a frantic action roguelite where you'll harness GunFu, Disco Balls, and Toasters to overcome demanding, fast-paced threats. Explore an unnerving yet playful city to uncover the secrets of HugFu and make some new friends along the way... if you can! No Rules, No Breaks, No Mercy.

name: Cats on Broombas
description: A wholesome MS-DOS puzzle-game about cats zooming around on Broombas collecting stars. They need your help!

name: Bobls
description: Bobls is a precise and bouncy 2D retro platformer. Complete the story through the single player or unique two-player campaign, create and play levels made by the community through the level editor used by the developers themselves.

name: Cryptower
description: Welcome to the world of Cryptower! In this captivating tower defense game, creativity and strategy intertwine. Develop your unique talents, enhance tower parameters, and unlock powerful abilities to defeat endless waves of enemies. Become a master of defense and protect your world

name: Rooms
description: Rooms — a multiplayer horror game for 2-4 players in an abandoned bunker. Survive, restore electricity, and escape from the maniac or hunt for victims. Procedural level generation will add uniqueness to each game.

name: Goddess of immortality
description: Goddess of immortality is a old school like strategy indie videogame, where i added all the keys i loved from old good wargames, and added a little part of action on top of it.

name: Hustlerix
description: Play as Gaul in the ancient world in this action-packed, open-world game & with a classic gameplay style. Defeat mythological beasts, and overthrow senators. Experience gladiator fights, chariot races, and stone-throwing. Abolish slavery and carve your path to freedom.

name: The M/S Cornelia II Incident
description: Somewhere in the Nordic Archipelago a man wakes up with no memory of who he is, how he got there or what happened to him. A short point-and-click adventuregame about a man overboard survivor.

name: Nothorian Online: Acceso Anticipado
description: Nothorian es un MMORPG de rol medieval, gótico y oscuro, basado en instancias funcionales sin una historia profunda y centrado más en la acción, la exploración y la construcción de tus personajes desde el Inicio. Inicia tu aventura con un guerrero, cazador, caballero, mago, druida, clérigo o monje.

name: Cosmic Race: Galactic Showdown
description: Get ready to blast into retro-racing madness with Cosmic Race! Our game reignites the arcade racing thrill, hurling you through mind-bending tracks, intense combat, and eye-popping visuals. It's like the 80s and 90s racing games on turbo steroids—strap in and relive the glory days!

name: Medieval Thief VR
description: "Medieval Thief", a thrilling single-player virtual reality game that takes you on a role-playing adventure set in a medieval world of darkness and secrecy. As a cunning thief, you will be equiped swords, bows and arrows to fend off soldiers trying to protect Medieval treasures

name: Diesel Mechs
description: Physics-based demolition simulator with diesel mechs. Operate mechs and heavy equipment as if they were real. Learn how to effectively use the equipments in this physics-based environment.

name: The Secrets of Skellig
description: A mysterious puzzle game with crossword inspired gameplay. Use your brain, keyboard, and mouse to unravel the secrets beneath a remote island.

name: Floating Wonderland
description: A 2D platformer set in a world of floating islands where gravity acts with strange properties and can point in any direction. Join one of 4 characters in their own story venturing through these strange and wonderful environments that twist and turn in all directions.

name: Alchemist: The Garden
description: You find yourself in a strange garden. You aren't sure how you got here but you know what you must do, escape! The path is simple, but nothing is as easy as it seems. Learn the rules of the garden if you wish to escape. Caution - this game is simple but can be challenging!

name: Overlode
description: A groundbreaking battle simulator blending deckbuilding and explosive real-time isometric action. Lead autonomous characters, conquer powerful enemies, and strategize your deck to overcome randomized challenges. Endless replayability and strategic depth await in this captivating experience.

name: Sojo
description: An online RPG with a persistent world, gear/level based progression, fast active turn based combat, platforming puzzles, and challenging objectives. Kill creatures, get loot, sell and buy loot, group with allies, and progress to overcome the games greatest challenges.

name: Pet Shop World
description: Manage your own Pet Shop like no one else!

name: Thawed Waters
description: Boating adventure of the old priest who stands against the ruthless corporation practising animal testing. Dive into flooded Siberia of 2047, where remnants of humanity fight another thawed virus. The game offers unique physics-based gameplay, wrapped in a heartfelt rabbits rescue saga.

name: Meine Oma 88
description: Meine Oma(88) is a non-linear exploration adventure that delves into the issues of transgenerational trauma linked to perpetrators in Nazi Germany. Play to escape the ever-looping narrative your grandmother tries to serve you as the truth.

name: Century of Steam
description: Century of Steam is a physics-based multiplayer railroad simulator and strategy game. Build your route through beautiful landscapes, customize and operate your fleet of historic trains, discover the sights, sounds, and stories of railroading with industry-leading steam, firing, and audio simulation.

name: Tangled Crisis
description: Beat the maze with limited vision before the time runs out! Avoid the dangers, find secret chests and shortcuts, while trying to get the highest score, in this casual retro themed experience.

name: Rune Golf
description: Guide a small golf ball through the ruins of a forgotten civilization, filled with traps and mysteries. Explore the remnants of a lost people, combining skill and curiosity in a unique narrative and contemplative journey!

name: Spawn Master
description: A game pitting the cunning strategy of the Spawn Master against the teamwork and bravery of the Humans. Spawn Master is two unique gameplay experiences in one. Spawn Master combines FPS and RTS experience into one terrifying package.

name: Marki Game Collection
description: Play with up to 16 players selected mini-games in random order. Two players can share one controller that everyone can play! More than 12 different games that are easy to learn and unique in their mechanics!

name: Rixer
description: Rixer is a fast paced 6 degrees of freedom space combat sim. Battle it out in different PvP game modes with bot support and compete in high speed races. Experiment with extensive live-multiplayer stat modding and map editor.

name: Godwalker
description: Godwalker is a single player FPS Roguelike where the faster you play the stronger you get.

name: Farmwand
description: Welcome to the world of Farmwand! Farmwand is an open-world fantasy adventure with lots of farming, potions and spells, where you will immerse yourself in an enchanted land full of monsters, magical creatures and tons of interesting characters.

name: Chaos-Alante
description: A magical online game with multiple players online, mainly featuring a rich skill set, highly playable equipment system, and a rich combat experience as its core. Use different options and combinations to engage in treasure brushing, challenge boss, and PVP battles, and win rich trophies

name: Star Apprentice: Dazzling Danmaku Detective
description: Find evidence, interrogate suspects, and shoot down contradictions in this magical girl detective game! Your magic turns each interrogation into a bullet hell logic battle - Use it to uncover the truth behind each magical mystery in your way!

name: Outer Wards: Proving Grounds
description: Build up your defenses and ward off any threats to your expedition in this rogue-like tower defense game. Manage your resources well and make sure no to overstay your welcome on this planet, or be prepared to face a never-ending onslaught of crustaceans...

name: Ooze Odyssey
description: Ooze your way through dank dungeons and dissolve thousands of monsters in this top-down shoot’em up roguelite. Slay enough and gather their essence to earn new cards from the Witch’s deck. Defeat powerful foes and explore deep places to earn more cards for your deck!

name: Cyber Cell
description: Set in a post apocalyptic world, Cyber Cell is a fast paced shooter meant to be both challenging and satisfying. Fight your way through the levels to find out who is behind your suffering.

name: Super Space Arcade
description: SUPER SPACE ARCADE is a fast-paced 3D interpretation of the classic arcade shooter games combined with action platformer elements.

name: One Life to Alice
description: This game consists of two interconnected parts. The first part is a visual novel about a girl named Alice, living in the near future. The pleasant visual presentation and a story based on real events will not leave you indifferent.

name: Forlorn Outcast
description: Confront fate in Forlorn Outcast, an immersive souls-like RPG. Stand your ground against the Drothar hordes, channel powerful spells, and discover the dark fantasy realm of Tilsa as you ascend from outcast to legend.

name: Over Jump Rally
description: RALLY! Hot blazing sun!Relive arcade racing with Over Jump Rally – an unofficial remake of Sega Rally from the '90s. Unreal Engine 5-powered stunning graphics, nostalgic music, and intuitive controls bring classic racing to a new generation. Easy, right? Maybe!

name: Excised
description: You awaken as a fugitive in a dystopian city. Choose your equipment and go! Run for your life as you are hunted down. Find a way to escape this dystopian city, in this action horror game with a innovative stealth system and immersive sim elements.

name: Dark Eyed Angels
description: Dark Eyed Angels is a story based survival horror game. A darker vision of the Grey Alien phenomenon. You play as Casey, when sightings are reported to occur around a strange weather phenomena and now it's on track to his home. He decides to stay and meet THEM

name: Project Watcher
description: The chaos will never end. Decimate your enemies, fight against hordes of invaders who know no mercy. Dozens of enemy types await you. Old comrades will stand in your way. Shoot first and never ask questions.

name: To Mortal Dust
description: This is an RPG game where you will follow our protagonist to fight and save lives!

name: Revamped
description: A completely non linear adventure, with screen filling bosses, which could have been named Metroidvania if it wasn't for legal issues.

name: Artisan Story
description: Aspiring to be the best artisan in the world, our young artisans are opening their own workshop complete with a monster ranch. Tame monsters from the dungeon, tend to your fantasy farm, collect materials and craft recipes, and experience a carefree story rich fantasy life

name: Starfuse
description: Embark on an epic sci-fi sandbox adventure across multiple planets in this 2D sidescroller. Explore, fight creatures, craft, and build in in a fully destructible world. Unleash the power of simulated elements, ride vehicles, and customize your character.

name: Lost Tenet
description: In a war-torn 13th century, the once protectors become the predators. After the razing of the sister city of Romne, the Knights Solomin have tasked themselves with the extermination of the alleged party responsible, the Clergy.

name: Death of Eternity
description: You were created to purge all that defile. Slaughter hoards of such filth, gaining powerful items and abilities with every drop of blood. Forge your own path through the heavens fully customizing your experience. Share in this virtuous crusade with up to three friends in Online multiplayer co-op!

name: Cube RPG
description: cube

name: Death Animal Parade
description: Casual Strategy game full with Animals

name: Digital City
description: Digital City is a novel simulator intended to support local authorities representatives and urban planners in their day-to-day work.

name: FlyBird Leap
description: Ready to push the limits of flight? Control the bird to fly over various obstacles, unlock the beauty picture, and become the champion of air flight!

name: Porta-Tower
description: Porta-Tower is a roguelike tower defense game where you can pick up and move your towers when their position becomes suboptimal. Relocate, upgrade, and unlock towers to defend your portal until the very end.

name: Flying Mustaches
description: Help the smileys get mustaches! Tap the screen to fling a mustache towards a smiley. If there are more than 10 smileys without mustaches, you lose.

name: Cheesy Munch
description: Eat the ham, skip the bombs!

name: Toast Shooter
description:
Toast Shooter is a fast action packed arcade style tap-the-right-item game!
Get your Jelly Cannon ready for all those tasty butter toasts jumping out of the toasters. But be careful - do not hit the dark toasts! Catch Rocket Toasts, Collect Bonuses- and Power Stars, repair defect toasters, get tap-combos and play bonus rounds to beat the high score!

name: Dig Girl
description:
As the last surviving heir of your great uncle Ludwig, you’ve inherited his Bavarian castle and its underground treasures. It’s up to you to survive each level and find... the greatest treasure of all.
30-levels of ad-free, retro-style graphics and gameplay await. Supports game controllers, landscape and portrait orientation, and comes with a custom level editor.

name: Block City Cop: Vice Town
description:
Block City Cop: Vice Town is an open world police simulator with shooter and racing elements. You play as a brave cop the purpose of which is to save the city from crime. You have to fight with armed gangsters, using all kinds of weapons and transport (police car, taxi, bus etc.).
In this game, you can freely navigate around the city, help residents, complete missions getting rid of bandits and get coins for it.

name: Rocket Carz Racing
description:
Rocket Carz Racing - Never Stop is the first game in the series of future in past Rocket Carz Racing games. Enjoy a new futuristic look of classic retro cars in the genre of endless arcade racing.
Real racing simulator of vintage cars with rocket engines! No wheels, no asphalt limits, only air flow and power of jet engines.
Drive each of your unique and super fast car through traffic of most known retro cars.

name: Monster Jam Game
description: Bringing the family-friendly entertainment of live Monster Jam events straight to your tablet or mobile phone all year round, Monster Jam is an authentic and dynamic mobile gaming experience! Monster Jam will not only allow you to relive your favourite Monster Jam moments but to create your own memorable monster truck stunts using all the biggest names in Monster Jam, including Grave Digger, El Toro Loco, Maximum Destruction and Monster Mutt! Smash through barriers in actual Monster Jam events and races, or freestyle through unique environments and hill climbs!

name: Crystal Journey
description: Are you ready to embark on a journey of discovery and puzzles? Welcome to 'Crystal Journey', the ultimate 3D puzzle game that challenges you to navigate a world of secrets and obstacles. Play as Lum, the brave adventurer on a quest to find the purple crystal, a rare and powerful artifact that holds the key to unlocking untold wonders.

name: Infasia
description: Vous êtes Xen, un diplomate d'une région paisible du Nord qui se retrouve plongé dans la capitale du monde d'Infasia. Entre guerres de clans, invasion de Sans-âmes, lutte entre des puissances incommensurables, vous devrez vous forger un nom dans ce royaume pour accomplir vos objectifs…

name: Mechanical Growth
description: Mechanical Growth is a built-for virtual reality game set in a fantasy Post-Apocalyptic world. Captain of your independent company, Loot, shoot, kick and scream your way to your next contract.

name: Hazy Hollow
description: Dig and explore the depth of the earth. Mine and harvest miscellaneous resources. Craft better tools and weapons and expand your base ! Fight against local mobs. Unlock electricity to lighten the darker depths. Automate harvesting to reign on the underground world !

name: Plunko
description: Plunko is an action platformer with an energetic twist!

name: Cats & Castles
description: In 'Cats & Castles', as King of the Cats, you must build, manage, and defend the greatest kingdom a cat has ever seen. Choose your cards wisely and balance your economy, food supply, and military. It's your responsibility to defend your kingdom from monsters with your mighty cat soldiers.

name: Fun Infused Arcade
description: Collection of small retro arcade games created by Fun Infused Games in a retro style. More games to be added in the future. Currently featuring the games Bounce Blitz, Haunting of Jerk Miners, Ultra Neon, and Ultra Aktion.

name: Dust Raiders
description: Dust Raiders is a management strategy game, set in a lawless wasteland. Upgrade your vehicles, engage in tactical fights against raiders hunting for your resources and gather a crew to rule the area.

name: Gobo’s Arena
description: Fight your way through the arena against other players ‘til only the goblin king remains

name: Planet Iridium
description: Planet Iridium is a third person, top-down, fantasy, Sci-Fi game. The game is heavily based around colony, economy and base building. Along with close-quarter combat and unique survival systems that will keep you on the edge of your seat as you unveil the deep dark secrets of Planet B58.

name: Bridge Hunter
description: Greetings, pilot. Get ready to deploy your drone for the mission at hand! Your objective is to prevent the enemy from using a vital bridge. You have the freedom to try out various tactics and abilities in a fully destructible environment. Your role is crucial!

name: Idle Build RPG
description: This game is an idle RPG game. Players only need a few simple operations to enjoy the joy of obtaining top-quality equipment.

name: Lumiel the Awakening
description: Lumiel the Awakening is an Open World Top Down Hack and Slash RPG Game set in a Fantasy Sci-fi Setting. Stranded on an island, players focus on exploration, building, and harvesting while battling monsters, collecting rare items, and uncovering hidden treasures in diverse dungeons.

name: Final Flock
description: Build a powerful flock and take to the skies to battle hordes of enemies. Glide and weave through perilous obstacles to gather resources and loot. Unlock powerful synergies and abilities to survive as long as you can.

name: Escape from Nalaxion
description: Prepare for an adrenaline-fueled, intergalactic battle like never before in our intense FPS shooter game! As a brave commander leading your platoon on a critical raid on Nalaxion 54, fate takes a thrilling turn when you accidentally stumble upon a hidden trap door.

name: Movierooms: Cinema Management
description: Become the manager of your own Cinema in this thrilling new Tycoon! Through space and time, explore the various aspects of handling a thriving business. Manage movie choices and screenings, staff, rooms, and more!

name: Neon City of Desires
description: The world is becoming more and more modern, but mental problems remain with humanity. Immerse yourself in this world with the main characters and find out what fate will befall them. Is this really the city of dreams?

name: Football Star Life 23/24
description: Become a football player and lead the career of your dreams. Be precise, score as many goals as possible, make the right choices during the transfer window, win numerous prestigious trophies, and become a legend!

name: Rezident Evil: It Is Escape
description: Rezident Evil: It Is Escape is a bizarre RPG Maker 2003 game. Starting life as the sequel to a terrible Resident Evil fan game from 2003, it gradually mutated into a Matt LeBlanc infested fever dream.

name: ZampanioSimulator
description: ZampanioSimulator is a browser-based simulation game, later released in standalone form on itch.io, that purports to be a simulation of an old retro game called Zampanio.
