Solve bizarre puzzles, explore uncanny replicas of various websites, and try to find out just how deep the rabbit hole goes. Can you make your mark on the world? Zampanio is a very good game. You should play it.

name: Yugen Saga
description: Yugen Saga is a new 2D MMORPG that you can access and play either through our client on our discord or on your web browser at play.yugensaga.com! This game has all kinds of progression and ways to build your character to your own liking. The max level of this game is level 50, once you hit this you can sell your experience from your journey which is levels 1 through 50. However, that is not all, after level 50 you still gain experience but it banks in your experience bar which you can then sell into all kinds of stats. The more you sell into a stat the more costly it gets though depending on the class of course the numbers are different. With the sale of experience, you unlock new maps and new content at certain thresholds of sales. So for example at 50 million experience sold you unlock a map where you can obtain gear and items for that sold which is Pirate's Cove! The style was inspired by NexusTK however we have taken 2D mmorpgs to a whole new level! We are completely free to play and the only things that will ever be released are cosmetic items in the cash shop so come join now and see what areas you unlock and new continents to explore!

name: Big Yeetus
description: As the unicorn Big Yeetus you have to run along a parcour to the top of the castle. Most things in the game will kill you instantly if you touch them. This is a difficult game that takes some practice to beat. When you have learned how to pass a section you can finish it very fast though.

name: Rockfish
description:
Rockfish is an unfinished iOS game that was being developed by Studio Pixel, the creator of Cave Story. Having started development in 2010, the game originally focused on a rockfish, who is contacted by a mermaid that has been imprisoned in an amulet. She asks the fish to collect the pieces of the shattered amulet in order to free her.

By the end of 2011, development was paused and the game's concept was retooled. This rebooted version of the game featured a man in a submarine as the protagonist. This version was being worked on until the end of 2012, after which the project was scrapped in favor of Kero Blaster.

In 2023, Pixel released a previously unreleased demo for Rockfish, dated November 27, 2011.

name: Technobabylon: Birthright
description: Sin descripción

name: Evelone Wrath
description: You are Evelone192, the founder of the Freak Squad. Your friends are captured and held hostage by your sworn enemies - members of an "Anti-Freak Squad". Can you save Buster and Lixxx?

name: M.E.R.C. Genesis
description: Get ready to experience high-octane Sci-Fi horror with "M.E.R.C Genesis". Embark on a journey that pushes the boundaries of fear, survival, and discovery. Can you withstand the darkness that awaits?

name: Under the Hood
description: Sin descripción

name: Mega City Police: Digital Collector's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Pizza Connection Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Infantry Assault: War 3D FPS
description: Infantry Assault: War 3D FPS, one of the variety of war games. Each new level has something new, different effects for shooting, a variety of soldiers, etc. The main goal of this game is to complete the level without leaving a single soldier alive.

name: Project Vesperi
description: Discover a sign of life on Venus and determine the fate of humanity in this story-driven, cinematic, branching narrative game.

name: MindBloc
description: MindBloc is a puzzle game that tests the player's logical ability, perfect for relaxing, or playing while your computer is loading another game.

name: Glam Descent
description: Pictures of beautiful, sexy women are waiting for you. However, players need to respond quickly and accurately to challenge their highest scores and get beautiful pictures

name: JurassicDragon and the Binary Relic
description: JurassicDragon and the Binary Relic invites the player to explore the secrets of the museum and to escape the grovelling fiend. dodge, press and explore the mysterious facility to find what is lurking within.

name: Blooming
description: Blooming, is a 2D platformer action game. Use your bow, which can be turn into dual blades, to defeat your foes and explorer different areas in any order you want. Defeat bosses in order to absorb their power and get new abilities.

name: My First Craft Survival
description: When I woke up, I found myself on an uninhabited island. And I had nothing with me! Anyway, the first priority is to find food to avoid starvation. At night, mysterious creatures attack, so I need to craft equipment and build a base to defend myself! In the end, there's a boss waiting for me!

name: Car Salon Kingdom
description:
Overhaul your customers’ rides and turn their junkers into high-speed supercars! Do you have what it takes to run a top-of-the-line auto repair shop?
A day in the life of an auto mechanic is brimming with troubles and problems to fix; but with Wrench and the gang, it’s all about giving their customers a sweet ride. Help Wrench, Flat, Ratchet, Pliers, Socket, Lube, Torque, and Hammer keep their customers satisfied and build a business empire that will offer the best car service in town!

name: DogHotel
description:
DogHotel invites you to manage a brand new dog resort, put your dog sitting skills to the test and learn how to run a successful doggy hotel business.
Look after all the doggies placed in your care.
Granny Edith's pug needs to lose some weight, beefy Lucky the Labrador wants to join the fire department and little Lizzy the Poodle wants to learn her first tricks. Make sure all the dogs have a nice time in your hotel and that they return to their owners happy.

name: Hungry Froo
description:
Use the simple touch controls to launch moon rocks into the trees! Drop all the delicious fruit to the ground for Froo to eat.
Be sure to aim carefully. Froo doesn’t want any of the rotten fruit and there are many challenging obstacles to avoid and puzzles to solve.

name: Bad Student Driver: Swing Ride
description:
Are you the best worst student driver? Can you earn your license? The Bad Student Driver returns with Swing Ride!
Drive your car as far as you can down the road, avoiding the traffic cones, wild animals, and the curb as you veer to the right, then to the left, and back again. Does your car badly need a front-end alignment, or are you just that bad of a driver? We're not sure, but the results are hilarious!

name: Kids Puzzle Animal Game
description: Explore the animal kingdom with Joey the Kangaroo through the shark aquarium, across the plains of Africa, and deep into Jazz Panda's musical jungle as you complete magical puzzles and explore animated landscapes!

name: Kepler Attack
description: Kepler Attack is an arcade game for your iPhone and Apple Watch. Fly through space and destroy waves of alien space invaders from Kepler-452b.

name: Mighty Match Puzzle Adventure
description:
You are Chouchou, heir of the Sacred Rooster Dynasty. Your quest is to travel across the Holy Mountain and free the Sacred Animals from the dark spell cast upon them by the mysterious Evil Master. To achieve your goal, you will have to gain experience and unlock the best weapons, by finishing as many objectives as possible.
But victory won’t come so easily! You will need courage and dexterity to align resources on your path, granting you more strength, defense and magic.

name: Stack Buddies
description: Lucco and his buddies love to stack! And it's easy to see why. Stack Buddies is an enjoyable game in which you drop bricks while trying to make the biggest tower that you can.

name: KatataK
description: Spearhead the resistance and fight your way across a war-torn London in story mode; Team up with awesome mercenaries to save the world! Battle an endless horde of interstellar kitties in survival mode to unlock new weapons and playable characters.

name: Zombie Racers
description: Take on the best Zombie Racers in this automotive zombie bloodfest.

name: Deathwave Aftermath
description: Deathwave Aftermath is an open world post-apocalyptic turn-based strategy game inspired by classic games like Final Fantasy and Chrono Trigger but with a higher focus on giving you control over how your character is built.

name: Gray Destiny
description: An indie precision platformer that offers an atmospheric and captivating experience. Take control of the young boy as he navigates through a series of meticulously crafted levels. The game's visuals blend terrifying traps with dark environments, immersing players in an exciting adventure.

name: Ogo
description: Ogo is an arcade twin-stick shooter where you control yin and yang to defeat your enemies, complete varied levels or just relax in different endless game modes.

name: Rageblocks
description: "Rageblocks" - Block Stapling Redefined! Unleash Sidescrolling Powerdowns, create 8x8 Mega Chunks and multiply your score! An electrifying puzzle revolution awaits!

name: Se/\/Se
description: Se/\/Se is a strategy, maze, horror game where you use your five senses to escape a mansion full of monsters. The senses you cherish most are ripped from you one by one and you must now survive without it. Make it through all five levels to escape. Will you navigate your way through the danger?

name: Immortal
description: "Immortal"is a game that simulates the operation of a cultivation sect. Players can hire cultivators to explore secret realms, cultivate spiritual plants, or refine pills and magic treasures, ultimately enhancing the sect's reputation and becoming the first sect in the cultivation world.

name: Ballistic Showdown
description: Prepare for an epic ball arena battle in Ballistic Showdown! master powerful moves, and compete against players from around the world. Get ready to dodge, shoot, and score your way to victory in this ultimate ball game. Play now and become the ultimate champion!

name: Car Factory
description: Start your own Car Factory. Build different Cars, Upgrade Stations and Cars, Expand your Factory.

name: Steampunk Runner
description: Summer. In a flying city that lacks grass, water, and clean air, the most sought-after and dangerous profession is guarding and patrolling the borders. Everyone wants the boy to be in the best set, and our hero didn't rule it out.

name: Collision Paradise
description: Hey, darling! Get ready for some adorable monster-smashing action with your balls! Oh no, there are so many of them! Help, save me! But don't worry, sweetheart, you've got this! Smash those monsters, unlock the most stunning CG rewards, and let's have a blast together! You're my hero!

name: Scary Siam Mall
description: Scary Siam Mall is a horror game in Tha Song Mueang Plaza shopping mall. atmosphere and scary.

name: Sexual Super Hero
description: Live the life of a super hero who must romance the queens and princesses of a parallel world to save his own world.

name: Mr. Amo
description: A Pseudo Dungeon RPG Game.

name: The Night Watch: Ranger Survival
description: The Night Watch : Ranger Survival is a tiny top-down shooting game where you must survive through the night with ranger's oldest friends - bow, arrow, and a bonfire. Shoot down monsters marching out from darkness, keep your bonfire and yourself safe, and survive to see the next sun rises.

name: Secret of Mana Turbo
description: Secret of Mana Turbo is a compilation of independent mods aimed at streamlining and accelerating the tried and true gameplay of Secret of Mana. Some of the main features include a streamlined weapon change menu and the removal of stamina, making a stream of consecutive attacks possible.

name: Molekular: Puzzle Adventure
description:
Start playing Molekular: Puzzle Adventure - loved by thousands of players around the world. Use atoms to form molecules. Don't worry! You don't need to be a chemistry-guru to play! Play levels to learn interesting facts about chemical compounds and become a true scientist!
Just swipe up, down, left or right to move the highlighted atom and bond it with the other ones on the board. Find out new compounds and get interesting facts about them.
Try to complete over 140 levels to become a true scientist!
Molekular: Puzzle Adventure is completely free to play but some optional in-game items will require payment.
You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.
You can play on the device you prefer (iPhone, iPad it's the same!), the game will always be up-to-date thanks to its cloud functions.

name: Monster Legends: Collect Them!
description:
Breed and train monsters of all elements and rarities! Build your fighting force and face the ultimate challenge: Battles against other Monster Masters!
Discover the universe of Monster Legends and the story of its inhabitants. Start by building a city for your monsters, fill it with habitats, and breed new species! Then, collect monsters and choose your strategy in action-packed battles.

name: Toy Craft
description:
Players begin the game with a single crafting ingredient and a crafting container.
From there, things quickly progress, allowing players to use more ingredients and containers, craft more advanced toys, and bring more happiness to the world!

name: Village Life: Love, Marriage and Babies
description: Start your family today!

name: Scramble Star Crossing
description: Embark on a stellar action-puzzle adventure! Engage in local multiplayer battles with 2-4 players. Hone your skills as a Star Clearer in our many single-player modes, clearing colorful stars in the night sky. Or unravel the mysteries of the world and its inhabitants with a huge cast of characters!

name: The Winds Rising
description: The Winds Rising is a story-driven action RPG developed by TiGames. It follows the journey of a girl from a peaceful village who embarks on a grand adventure after she encounters a lost monster cub, which affects the rise and fall of the entire kingdom. Her fate is in the player’s hands. Players can look forward to a refreshing and smooth combat experience, immersive and captivating story, and a world of ever-changing adventure.

name: Exiledge
description: The universe trembles, the soil shatters. A young man called Alter embarks on the adventure to uncover the destiny of the world built by Zora. In Exiledge, experience a unique combat system on the base of third-person shooter with hack and slash. Fight along with the mysterious girl, Zora, and experience colorful battles and epic boss fights. Search for the truth of the universe and the opportunity to save the world in an eternal cycle.

name: Daba: Land of Water Scar
description: Daba: Land of Water Scar is a new title from Dark Star. It tells the story of a humanoid clay puppet. When the world is on the verge of collapse, the puppet traces the whereabouts of the water fragments within the ancient city, and throughout their journey of defeating enemies and seeking answers, unravels the story of the world and oneself. The game features various landscapes including abandoned ruins, a magnificent ancient city, gloomy prison, vast rift valley, expansive snowfield, deadly forest, and a floating city. Non-linear levels are interconnected, distinct, and intricate.

name: Blue Dragon: Shuffle Dungeon
description: Shuffle Dungeon has arrived! This new content features a mysterious dungeon that changes every time you enter. Along with more than 30 new items, powerful monsters, and more than 10 new hard-to-beat bosses, there are certainly some challenges in store for you! Are you up for it? (Recommended Starting Level: 50 or higher. Supports Hard and Impossible game modes.) Note that you will need to be near the end of the game, and have saved that game, in order to enter a Warp Cube to Shuffle Dungeon.…

name: Bingaboll
description: You are a basketball that handles gravity and your job is to get into the hoop before the bells ring, you have 24 seconds to overcome the obstacles and get in

name: Castle Push
description: Castle Push is a fantasy and strategy game developed by Blue Cat Studio. Play the classic browser strategy. Complete all levels and unlock all possible achievements in this game. And listen to the best music from Haindale.

name: The King in the Shades
description: A classic survival-horror experience set in a fictional universe where the invisible hand of unspeakable horrors is turning humanity into a fleeting memory. Enter the world of The King in the Shades and rid this decaying world of the curse of Gods.

name: OwnRulesRPG
description:
"OwnRules RPG" is an immersive open-world role-playing game that allows you to slip into the role of a fictional character.
The game offers a variety of features that allow you to fully customize your character, from choosing their appearance to their clothing and vehicles.

name: Ataxia
description: A brutal cyberpunk 4X turn-based strategy game. Take control of one of 5 gangs in Technograd — a dark, crime ridden city where getting to the top is the only thing that matters.

name: Truco!
description: After losing his soul in a card game gamble, a boy must recover it by traveling around the Underworld! Face strange creatures and the Devil itself in this RPG with a battle system based on a popular card game in Brazil, the Truco! Cheat your way through the challenges you will face and take your Soul back, but remember, the enemies can do the same with you!

name: GalaX
description: A doujin shoot-em-up by MasaHG.

name: My Kingdom for the Princess II
description: The official sequel to the addictive, award-winning strategy, time management, simulation game "My Kingdom for the Princess" It's the right time to prove yourself worthy of being a knight once again!

name: Lost Girl In Mirror
description: This is a girl puzzle adventure game, through the wisdom of the gentlemen's minds, through the complete patchwork scenes, to save the girls trapped in the mirror, to give them a place to live. More than a dozen different characters and scenarios for you to explore.

name: Racerloop
description: Racerloop is a zero-gravity arcade racing game based on the Outer Ring universe where you take on a new challenge to be the fastest in the universe. In Racerloop, you will be able to customize and upgrade your ships, trading and exchanging parts and vehicles in a blockchain-based economy and marketplace.

name: Senile Wizards
description: Take the roll of a mighty wizard battling for honor and glory. Choose from dozens of crazy upgrades and smite your opponents

name: Tales of Arise: SAO Collaboration Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: My Hero One's Justice 2: Cheerleader Costumes Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Nerf Legends: Ultimate Nerf Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Street Outlaws 2: Winner Takes All - Skull Noir Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Snow Wars
description:
Step into the immersive world of Snow Wars. Gather your friends and prepare for thrilling snowball battles with up to 8 players, where skill and strategy will lead you to victory.

Snow Wars brings a refreshing twist to the shooting game genre by offering a casual yet engaging gameplay experience without any violence or bloodshed.

name: Wildwood Divas
description: Are you ready to take on the flying monsters? Step onto your plane, face an endless army of monsters, prove your strength, and win the most precious beauty pictures!

name: Mack Attack
description:
It's not easy being a mackerel, all those pesky piranhas always want to eat you!
Steer away by wobbling your iPhone or iPad and try to survive as long as possible.
There's a surprise game mode for you if you can last for at least 80 seconds!
The Jelly fish may be annoying, but don't be to hard on them, do they even have brains? I don't know.

name: Parking Swipe
description:
We have all been there – stuck in a parking jam at a parking lot and no matter how many times you go back and forth, you are still jammed! Don’t let that happen on your phone. With Parking Swipe - 3D Cars Puzzle Jam, you have full control over the parking jam. Use your brain and logical thinking to decide how to unblock the parking lot. Figure out which car needs to move first and in which direction to unblock other cars.
With amazing 3D graphics and hundreds of parking jam levels, Parking Swipe - 3D Cars Puzzle Jam will surely keep you entertained for hours. Even if you bump into a car or two while trying to ‘unjam’ the jam, that’s no reason for concern in this car parking game unless you are playing a challenge where every move counts. Literally.

name: AceRace
description:
Did you ever wanted to feel the speed in a Soap-Box car, now with AceRace you can.
AceRace is a skill-based action racing game. Train your reflexes jumping over obstacles, crouching under dangerous trucks and avoiding parked cars.
Detailed graphics, adictive soundtrack, differents controls, special abilities...

name: Detective Barnett: The Cursed Artifact
description: Put your sleuthing skills to the ultimate test to solve a mystery like no other in this wild match-3 puzzle adventure!

name: Burn
description: The title, and the compo themes might provide clues. This is a puzzle.

name: TurtleQuest
description: TurtleQuest is a 2D-Platformer where you are sent on a quest to save your little turtle village from an unknown disease. You have to follow an ancient path through the old mountains, riddled with bewitched traps, to find the sacred plant Zingiber, which might help to cure all turtles.

name: Colors of Fate
description:
Within a peaceful village in the middle of a forest lived Melia, a cheerful and stubborn young girl; and her best friend Enris, who dreamed of becoming the village's next herbalist.

Both of them were happy without worry until an unfortunate incident separated the two children tragically.

Life is not always made of fairytales and tranquil days.

But come... and see Melia's fate unfold before your eyes, as she becomes a strong and independent young woman throughout the years!

name: Smashing
description: Destroy all the blocks to advance. More than 50 levels of brick-smashing fun! If the ball falls below the game area a pad is lost. Play Smashing game online on your mobile phone, tablet or computer.

name: Living the Dream
description: What if fairy tales dreamed of real life? A visual novel adventure that explores the meaning of dreams and identity.

name: Monster Hunter Rise: DLC Pack 4
description: Sin descripción

name: Heroes of Egypt: The Curse of Sethos - Collector's Edition
description: Safely locked away in a temple complex for ages, sinister powers are unleashed, causing chaos and a momentous curse. Your path will take you and your Egyptians through different landscapes. Defeat countless creatures and lose no time to lift the curse!

name: Boxes
description: Welcome to Boxes, a nostalgic pixel art game that will put your puzzle-solving skills to the test! Embark on a delightful journey through over 100 mind-bending levels in this charming and addictive box-pushing adventure.

name: Bouncers
description: Bouncers is a single player retro styled action game that has you avoiding enemies to climb the leaderboard. The bouncer will bounce around the screen in random directions and multiply over time, but more enemies for example the asteroid will appear.

name: Dawn of Marionette
description: An android suddenly comes to the player who was leading an ordinary life. A thrilling life with battles and adult activities.

name: The Marvelous Misadventures of Flapjack: Bottle Cap'n
description: Sin descripción

name: Pizza King Fight
description:
Compete with your rivals to become the Pizza king!

It all started with a misunderstanding between the living pizzas...
Pizza and pizza collide in this rule-free battle!
...Is that what the battle to determine the best pizza is all about?

name: Trapped in The Kanal
description:
I got locked in the keep-out area in a waterway
The quiet sound of water flow makes me uncomfortable
I need get out of here……

name: Windstorm Double Pack
description: Windstorm: Start of a Great Friendship Discover the fascinating story of Mika, a girl known as a horse whisperer, as she tries to befriend the black stallion called Windstorm.

name: OMA: One Man Army
description: A hostile force has enslaved most of the human race! You are humanities last resort to put an end to the rampant force that is taking over the world! Do you have what it takes to destroy the enemy headquarters while navigating treacherous obstacles and fighting off dangerous enemies?

name: Happy Jogging in Hawaii
description:
Pound the streets and the beaches of Waikiki and surrounds in this jogging simulator which tells you how many calories you've burnt up. Also has a time attack mode for when you're feeling particularly fit and healthy.

The game features four game modes (Free mode ,3km, 6km & 12km) and different routes in each course that the player can choose during the course.

name: Risk Ranch
description: Welcome to the first and most exciting agriculture-based learning app for kids of all ages! Risk Ranch is a fun, free and fast-paced, single-player education game with engaging, real-life content, challenging you to learn about the economics of agriculture while bringing your steer to market. Avoid risks, allocate your coins wisely and purchase Futures to protect your investment… It’s up to you to safely raise your steer and make a profit on your farm! As you progress throughout the game, you’ll have a chance to play through all four seasons while learning about the real-time risks that affect the value of your steer.

name: SquirrelWarz
description: SquirrelWarz is a handcrafterd real time strategy mixed with casual game-play.

name: Magical Swirl
description: Welcome to this simple app. All you need is just 60 seconds. Tilt your device and your toy will move around. Collect stars to get points and increase the multiplier. Compete against your friends and time in this unique arcade app. Complete missions. Get rewards. Get cards and have fun.

name: Up With A Fish!
description: Tilt your device to catch falling objects. Move the Fish up your stack by catching more fish bowls. How high can you score before you miss 3 fish bowls?

name: Big Buck Hunter: Marksman
description: For over 20 years, Big Buck Hunter has been a cultural icon as the world’s favorite hunting game. Millions of players have gotten hooked on the simple-to-play, hard-to-master game in their favorite bars, restaurants and arcades around the globe. Now, the legendary arcade franchise is introducing a sharp-shooting, competitive twist to the classic series and bringing the best-selling title to an exciting new place - your fingertips!

name: Pocket BMX
description:
Pocket BMX is a free-roaming 2D bike riding game that’s packed full of challenges that will see you pulling all kinds of air tricks and grinds with combos that will blow your mind.
Play through the story mode where all the BMX parks are in danger of being closed and its up to you to save the parks. With the help of your mentor the BMX Ninja, who will set various challenges for you throughout the levels, you will soon learn all the skills required to become an expert rider.

name: Time Bomb Race
description: Help Tiny Wheels and its friends to survive as long as they can. Imagine waking up with a bomb on their head and knowing only they have to run as fast as they can! Travel through many landscapes: from the nice calm country, to bumpy canyons, slippery icebergs and many more.

name: Retro Speed Game
description: Feel the thrill of high speed racing in Retro Speed. It is an arcade racing game in which the speed of your car constantly increases as you keep collecting coins. Overtake as many cars as possible and emerge as the leader. Don't miss playing this highly addictive and fun game.

name: Over Street: Traffic Racer
description: Over Street: Traffic Racer is the latest arcade racing game with ton of adrenaline. Drive your car through highway traffic, earn cash, upgrade your car and buy new ones. Try to be one of the fastest drivers in the global leaderboards on each game mode.

name: Bottle vs. Bullet
description: Fun bottle shooting game in 3d modes! Bottle vs Bullet is a fun physics bottles shooting game. You must shoot as many bottles as you can in the fixed amount of time. A very addicted shooter game is out now on the market! Your challenge is to shoot bottle and can as fast as you can. And for each 10 combos get shot, a little extra time will be added.

name: Tap the Road
description: Do you like a smell of petrol in the morning? So it’s your time to drop the hammer in this old school racing madness!

name: TD Tower Defense
description: Build your towers according to the enmey you are facing in the wave. Upgrade your turrets to increase range, damage or rewards. Each enemy wave will be random and increases in speed and damage resistance. How far can you go!

name: HeroTower
description: "Hero Tower" is a game without regular monsters where you directly face challenging bosses. Dodge the boss's attacks through rolling and jumping, and seize the opportunity to counter-attack. It tests players' reflexes, stamina management, and insight into the boss's moves.

name: Dear Pretentiousness
description: A train of thought twine game.

name: Sapo Xulé and the Unwanted Marriage
description: Sapo Xulé and the Unwanted Marriage is an upcoming platformer game, developed by Squash Studios to celebrate the character's 30th anniversary.

name: Skull Jones
description: Skull Jones tells the story of a badass ladybug trying to change the natural selection of his habitat, where everyone judges his species as fragile.

name: Beethoven: The Ultimate Canine Caper!
description: Beethoven: The Ultimate Canine Caper is an unreleased Game Gear action platform game developed by Unexpected Development and scheduled to be published by Hi-Tech Expressions.

name: Beethoven's 2nd: The Quest for Pups
description:
Beethoven's 2nd: The Quest for Pups is an unreleased action game for the Sega Mega Drive based on the film, Beethoven's 2nd. An entirely different Beethoven's 2nd game was released around the same period for the Super NES. It was featured at Winter CES 1993.

A prototype of the Mega Drive version was released by Hidden Palace on January 1, 2022.

name: Worldwide Soccer
description: A Brazilian version of Tony Meola's Sidekicks Soccer without the sponsorship by the player. The game itself has no modifications from the original version.

name: Camera Anima
description: The Artisan, one of one of Awyr's most infamous killers, is said to walk the cloudy streets looking for his next masterpiece. Pursue the Artisan, save your sister, and uncover the past, but remember what the stories say…Meet his face, and never wake again.

name: Parallel
description: Parallel is a vast sci-fi universe with five factions battling for home. Assemble a deck and take the fight to Earth.

name: Minecranker
description: Crank the mines

name: My Fishing Boat
description: Explore many seas fishing and discovering treasures... and other surprises!

name: Paper Toss
description: Sin descripción

name: Westland Cowboy: Rodeo Rider
description: Sin descripción

name: I See You
description: Sin descripción

name: Bouncing Rainbow
description: Sin descripción

name: Goddess Era: Paradise Oath
description: Sin descripción

name: Brick Hero Clash
description: Sin descripción

name: Tanks
description: Sin descripción

name: Nexus War: Civilization
description: Sin descripción

name: Battery Hunter
description: "Battery Hunter" is a 2D pixel-art style linear level game where player must ensure their ability to defeat the final boss.

name: Echoes of Karma
description: Echoes of Karma is a game about a flirty demon and gay magician who travel the multiverse. As they travel, they discover a threat known as Glitch. The game is a turn based RPG, but with Blocking Mechanics during the enemy turn. Save TP by skipping your turn to use higher level abilities!

name: Hatsuyuki Sakura: White Graduation
description: Sin descripción

name: Hatsukoi Sankaime
description: Sin descripción

name: Ore no Yuukyuu Koi Monogatari
description: Sin descripción

name: Koi suru Kanojo no Bukiyou na Butai
description: Sin descripción

name: Hentai Girls: Adventure Clicker
description: Sin descripción

name: Hentai: Young Valkyries
description: Sin descripción

name: Century: Age of Ashes - Rimeblood Premium Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Keltika
description: Keltika is a story driven economic strategy game inspired by celtic myths and history. Ancient druid magic, power of the celtic gods or even perseverance and knowledge of your people - only you choose the way to conquer Keltika!

name: Have Fun Together
description: Sin descripción

name: Lethal Operation: Episode 3 - Lethal Arms of Justice
description: Sin descripción

name: Jaden & Jasmine: Lost Memories
description: It's been exactly one month since Jaden Black was shot and betrayed by Jasmine Miles. Did she complete her mission? Well in Lost Memories you not only find that out, but you find out what Harmony's motive was. This game follows the events of the first game Jaden & Jasmine: The Curse of Deception.

name: GoHome
description: No matter how far you go, never forget the direction home. In this game, your only objective is to go home.

name: Horror Loop
description: Horror Loop, made with a new generation game engine with a deep, impressive and original story, is waiting for you!

name: Call of Farming
description: A game for you to create your own farming or simulation game. It includes an inventory, craft, building, growing plants, farm animals and much more.

name: Snake Jump
description: You're a snake who is tired of living on the ground. You wanna explore the sky and go as high as you can. Take on a thrilling obstacle cours and a beautiful mystery awaits you at the top...

name: Metal Mission 2015: Dino Island
description: An evil force holds an island, where they revived Jurassic dinosaurs with a mysterious technology, and use them as their super-weapons! You will break into the enemy's camp alone, go through heavy fires, and ultimately save the world!

name: Mission To Mars 3D
description:
Fly to Mars and drive your rover to probe for water and organic molecules! Navigate the terrain without taking too much damage and within the limit of your power cells. Feel your way around with robotic arm and two probe fingers.
Features the latest in advanced 3D rendering, physics, and high quality interactions, high resolution textures and attention to modeling detail of the rover vehicle, arm, terrain, and planets.

name: Space Gate Rush
description:
In Gate Rush your mission is to land on all space Dock stations and then rush to Mothership’s gate. Do you have what it takes?
Earn in-game currency from landing on space Dock stations and going through the gate. Protect yourself from scary space monsters bent on destroying your beautiful spaceship! Invest the in-game currency in new space ships with more boost and power ups!
Easy to play but hard to master means you will be coming back again and again.

name: Swordash
description: Get ready to defend your home against a horde of insane enemies in this epic adventure! A mysterious girl has returned, and it's up to you to stop the invasion. Show off your bravery and become the ultimate hero!

name: Cell to Singularity: Evolution
description:
Tap into the extraordinary tale of evolution in this cosmic clicker game!
Once upon a time, over 4.5 billion years ago, there was no life in the Solar System. And then, almost in the blink of an eye on the geologic time scale, everything changed. Deep in the primordial soup on Earth lay the organic compounds that would give rise to life’s humble origins. All it takes for this epic evolution game to unfold is you.
Turn to the next page of evolution with every click. Gain entropy to unlock the next chapter of the evolution of life. Uncover twists and turns that led to the great milestones of life evolution: the extinction of the dinosaurs, the discovery of fire, the Industrial Revolution, and more. See chapters that have yet to be written -- a future evolution beyond the modern day.

name: The Return of the Heroes
description:
The monsters attacked the Castle wyk and have kidnapped the Princess!
Heroes, join the battle, occupy the farms, summon the soldiers of God, find the way to victory and rescue the princess!

name: Penalty Soccer 2012
description:
You cannot know Robert Baggio, Del Piero, Cristiano Ronaldo, Diego Maradona, neither know Juventus, Real Madrid, Manchester United,and even Brazil team, but you shouldn’t deny playing the game Penalty soccer 2012.
Penalty soccer 2012 is a simulation game of the real soccer.
The game will bring you into a decision on the fate of the soccer, which you can feel the moment be a life-and-death matter.

name: Blendoku
description:
A puzzle game that will challenge your ability to distinguish and arrange colors. The game is based on color principles and exercises taught in art schools around the world.

Try and beat the world average, beat your personal best, or go for a perfect score for those perfectionists out there!

name: Puzzle Bonsai
description: Puzzle Bonsai is a fresh and relaxing puzzle game where you take on the challenge of combining parts of the puzzle tree to form a correct equation. An excellent way to keep your thinking nimble every day of the year!

name: Fliggles Rescue Adventure
description:
Everyone needs a hero!
Fliggles Rescue Adventure is an addictively fun platform-type game that appeals to all ages. The colorful artwork, fun & lively music (headphones recommended), and exciting game play will have you hooked from the first screen. Fliggles Rescue Adventure is easy to learn, yet challenging to master as the levels and chapters become progressively more difficult. Fliggles Rescue Adventure has brought laughter and delight to all that have tried it, truly ‘Fantastic Fun for all’.

name: Grow Beets Clicker
description:
Are you ready to play Beet Growers? The plant farming game filled with colour, candy and adventure! Meet the Beet Buddies! They are like birds - they hatch from eggs, and each of them is unique. Beet Buddies have a sweet tooth, and that's why they like sweets and candy most of all! Feed the Beet Buddies and watch them evolve and grow.
Beet Buddies love to dress up - put some funny clothes on them to create your own beet story!

name: Sweets and Swipes
description:
Feed the Sweet Tooth! He’s upset without sweets!
Swipe the candies as fast as possible, and they’ll go directly into his mouth.
The more you feed him, the sooner you get new sweets!
Go to the factory and improve production to feed Sweet Tooth faster. And don’t forget to pamper him with delicacies and add fillers to earn more!

name: Golf Star
description:
Introducing Golf Star, the greatest golf game you’ll ever play, featuring realistic graphics, golfing techniques mastered by the pros, and a simulation powered by real physics-based gameplay. Enjoy exciting Perfect Swings with golfers from all over the world!
Enjoy the high-quality online authentic golf game Golf Star right now!

name: Solve & Roll
description:
Download and try the free demo! Try the first 20 levels for free!
Make clever use of shapes by building bridges, towers, ramps, loops, slides, catapults, and more, all to guide a little green ball to a shiny gold star.
Place the shapes correctly to reveal the satisfying solutions to over 200 clever physics puzzles, ranging from the pleasingly simple to the deeply challenging. Can you solve them all?

name: Shuffle in One
description: Shuffle in One is a physics puzzle that your goal is simple : Knock all targets out of arena in one move only! You may adjust the speed of your polygons/circles, and set spin for polygons. Your are allowed to launched your polygons/circles once only! Beside you and target polygons/circles, there are some other types of objects such as blocks, traps and heaters.

name: 4Spaces
description:
If you want to detach from your busy life, stress relief this colouring game might help you there. 4Spaces is an addictive puzzle game, it is based on applying Voronoi diagram and four colour theorem. The goal of the game is to fill up the cells with 4 different colours, until entire screen is coloured. Two Cells can not have same colour if they share a common border.

4Spaces may seem easy at first, but it quickly turns into an addicting, brain-twisting challenge. It has 12 unique levels - Hours of mind-bending fun!

name: Gravitas!
description: In this fast paced puzzle-shooter mash-up, you are the captain of the defense force of Gravitas, a peaceful galaxy far away from Earth. One day a wormhole appears in the center of Gravitas and begins raining debris and trash into the atmosphere of the galaxy’s various planets. To defend against the invasion, you must match three or more of the same types of trash and launch them back into the wormhole. Hit the wormhole with enough debris to save each planet. Complete all 20 levels to eventually uncover the source of the wormhole and shut it down.

name: Nestor the Nesting Bird
description:
Keep Nestor the Nesting Bird laying eggs on the highest nests of the tree. Use your aiming skills to shoot an egg into the nest, let it hatch, and have a new Nestor bird try for the next nest! Don't let those pesky bugs and the unpredictable wind break your egg!

Test your precision and timing in two fun game modes and challenge your friends to reach the highest branch. Keep collecting coins and unlock different types of funny eggs!

name: Alien Tower
description:
Arcade game requiring precision and anticipation.
Fun, simple and hot, welcome to Alien Tower!

name: Bloku!
description: Bloku! is a unique interpretation of the classic block puzzles. Draw and erase blocks from the board. Try to clear as many lines as possible without letting the blocks surpass the top. Get ready to the newest addicting block puzzle!

name: Flicklash
description: Flicklash is an addictive arcade game in which you control a cursor using a simple pull and release mechanic.

name: Ultimate Gem
description: Sin descripción

name: Hoodsters
description: Play as Tommy and see how far you can get through the magical forest and the Sky Kingdom. Use your special powers to get you further and keep your cool to be able to beat your best friends score and brag to the world!

name: Santa's Giftship Reloaded
description:
Help Santa and the elves save Christmas!!
The first sign of trouble arose when Krampus thought he could do a better job than good ole St. Nick and things steadily got worse from there. Now a third of the North Pole has turned into angry, envious elves deceived by Krampus, Santa’s evil twin. They are attempting to shut down Christmas! Early reports are coming in of elf operatives aligning with dissenters nearing Santa's workshop. Reinforcements are headed to the scene as well but will it be soon enough? Will the children be left with nothing but coal?! It is up to you to help Santa save Christmas. Elf Suit up! Don’t let these evil forces choose a counterfeit and prevail with their cries.
The critics of the controversial Frostmaster BL19 Sleigh will be eating crow tomorrow...

name: Frozen Synapse
description:
Frozen Synapse brings the simultaneous turn-based strategy genre bang up-to-date and lets you give detailed, accurate orders to your squad: classic gameplay with a modern interface.

Plan your moves, test them out, then hit the "Prime" button: both you and your enemy's turns are executed simultaneously.

Competitive-but-intuitive multiplayer and a huge single player campaign mean that Frozen Synapse will give you hours and hours of tactical delight.

name: Robots Runner
description:
Description Run with your robot into a dark abandoned factory! But beware an infinite path of dangers, put your personal best! avoid the enemies and not fall from the platform if you will not immediately end your adventure.
Your robot is able to jump the platforms with incredible leaps but is also equipped with a "G" device capable of reversing gravity! you find yourself running upside down! use this trick to avoid the big obstacles you encounter on your ride.

name: Doraemon Gadget Rush
description:
Help Doraemon take back his future gadgets from alien techno-thieves!
Blast the aliens to bits by forming a string of same colored gems on the game board. Form as many gem combos as you can within a given time limit! Chain combos to unleash Fever Time and look for rare power-ups for more points and damage. Unlock Doraemon's friends to help him in battle. Level-up and equip powerful weapons with unique boosts. Defeat all the aliens and retrieve all of Doraemon's 42 stolen future gadgets!

name: Tail & Trails
description: A short exploration game where you and your magical pets take a walk on one fine evening.

name: Max Beyond
description: Max Beyond is a third person action adventure game with elements of stealth, combat and tactical gameplay layered with a cinematic story bursting with twists and turns.

name: Kurt '99: The Football Manager
description: Kurt '99: The Football Manager - The perfect soccer manager for young and old. Game depth and fun guaranteed. Kurt puts football back in the spotlight.

name: Towerful
description: Build up your armada of artillery towers and defend the lands of Tulraak and Arcton from invading battleships whose only goal is to break through your barriers and steal your planet's resources!

name: The Panic Room: House of Secrets
description: A hidden object game featuring an exciting detective plot, realistic graphic and atmospheric music.

name: Underworld Defense
description:
Demons always torture humans. Now, in afterlife, humans has a chance to revenge.
Underworld defense is third person tower defense game in which you have spawning grounds instead towers where you can call your army to help defending your gate.

name: Love Story
description: It is a simple Tsukkur story game with a high proportion of events. Depending on the choices made in the game, various endings and the development of the story in the middle will change. Some objects show slightly different stories depending on the number or order of selection.
